name: George Glass
text: Great people at counter

name: Bob Frick
text:
Can't live without them!!
We cooling now.

name: Bob Frick
text:
Totally SHOCKED !!
Took my tanks in to have refilled, which where filled two months earlier else where. Get to the back to fill the worker comes out we talk, then I’m told my tank is too old to fill, oh ok now he is checking the other tank. It’s is out of date too . Well of course I inquire about how to tell. Then he tells me how you can be harmed horribly by filling an out of date tank. Says I should be a new tank come with me I’ll show you some. Then tells me how the state test them by getting them to fill bad tanks and more Regulation talk. THEN HE SAYS I WOULD FILL THE TANKS IF I KNEW YOU .
WHAT I ASKED DID YOU SAY ? Did you say if you knew me you would fill them? He said yes.
WHAT IN THE WORLD IS GOING ON HERE?? I left THAT IS VERY DANGEROUS!!!! NEVER AGAIN WILL I USE THIS PLACE. TOTALLY UNSAFE SHOULD BE SHUT DOWN!!!
Fill out of date tanks if they know you.REALLY.

name: Rick Thompson
text:
1 star for being a bunch of time wasters. We were loyal customers for 3 years. We moved houses and asked for them to come out and fill our tank in the new house.

Monday-- Dispatch said they will put us in the system and will be onsite next day.
Tuesday-- No show. Called dispatch and they assured us we where in the "system" and will be out next day.
Wednesday -- No show. Called again and told us we were not in the "system". Scheduled us for next day.
Thursday -- No show. They told us once more that they will come tomorrow. After hearing that a 4th time we decided to cancel.

@ThompsonGas Whatever "system" you are using will undoubtedly lose more customers.  Be honest when building expectations. It would have been totally fine if you said "we'll be there on Friday." But instead I was told "tomorrow" each time. So I stayed home when I could have been in the office. Get your shjt together, be professionals,  and stop leading people on.

name: Ailee Hood
text: Very helpful customer service i.e. how to get an account and service set up, and yes they take care of you way out in the country!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing!

name: Barbara Evans
text: Good service. Caring people.

name: Sharon DeFee
text: Office personnel are so lacking they can't find your bill by name or address. Maybe I'll just change to ACME.

name: Danny Thigpen
text: Came out during Ice/Snow. Working under difficult Time, was very dependable and Professional.  Gist service has been my service Company for over 30 years.

name: Mark Tomlinson
text: Did great work at a great price. No complaints at all. Will use Gist from now on.

name: gerald morrison
text: I called for help on a Saturday morning. They arrived in less than 2 hours. Very reasonable charge for service. I highly recommend!!!

name: Lori Green
text: My AC went out in early June.  I called 3 different places.  The first two were based in Florence and said it would be 2 days before they could come out.  The receptionist at Gist was very nice.  Her tech called me back about 15 minutes after I first called them.  He came out, looked at it, went to get the part he needed to fix it, came back and it was fixed about 2 hours after I first called them.  Tech was very nice as well.

name: Timothy Whalen
text: I've used Gist Services ever since I moved to Florence 13 years ago. They always give prompt, friendly, service. They've always been honest. They've always taken care of the problem.

name: Russell williams
text: Great with the service and very satisfied with the cost of equipment

name: Chris Lash
text: Called for part's information and left my phone number. They called back within 15 minutes with the price and the availability info.

name: Aaron Parker
text: Great staff! Alex FTW

name: joey _
text: Excellent service as always from tj mcquillan

name: Bruce Long
text: Always great to do business with

name: Brandon Dunn
text: These guys suck

name: Chuck Brock
text: Very dissatisfied, with the restrictions is hard to do any shopping, they have a small waiting area where service technicians conjugate while they stay behind a barrier

resp.text: Dear Chuck, due to an abundance of caution surrounding the spread of COVID-19, some locations are currently practicing Curbside Service only. We certainly hope things get back to normal soon. In the meantime, we do have some additional ordering / pickup tools available at www.bakerdist.com/covid-19. Thank you for your patience and we truly value your business.

name: Victor Garcia
text: Says it closes at 5 and they close by 4:30

resp.text: Dear Victor, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We had an incorrect closing time on Google; this has now been corrected. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience and hope that you give us another chance in the future.

name: Chuck Brock
text: Great counter service!

resp.text: Dear Chuck, thank you for taking the time to leave us this excellent review. We are happy to hear that our counter service is meeting your expectations. Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Mike Hayes
text: Great people

resp.text: Dear Mike, thank you for taking the time to leave us this excellent review. We will be sure to pass along the kind words to our Mobile team. Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Garrett Pearson
text: Timely and professional. All issues faced were resolved. Would recommend to anyone needing a quality air conditioner and wanting to conduct business with honest, diligent people.

name: Chuck Brand
text: We have used them for years to work with a large house on campus and found Hughes & Mullenix to be a great partner. The few times we have had someone try and call a competitor, we have found the quotes/costs to be considerably more, work less professional, and even had another company say a unit needed replaced and would take a week to get the new air conditioning unit. When I found out they had called another company, I had the person call Hughes & Mullenix who was able to fix the issue in one visit for the cost of parts and a service call. I would not use anyone else in Tuscaloosa!

name: Walt Park
text: Great job ,very helpful staff, professional service and highly recommend

name: Tammy Watkins
text: Awesome service always!

name: Dennis Cosby
text:
Our upstairs AC went out on a Friday evening. After a couple of unsuccessful calls to set up a Monday appointment and reading good reviews for Skelton’s I made an online appointment for AM on Monday to repair one unit and service the other two. First thing Monday I got a call the technician was coming. Jeremy was very professional and we were very pleased with his work.
Definitely will recommend and use in the future.

name: Jake Doughty
text: My A/C quit cooling on a Friday evening and I called Skelton’s on-call number. A technician called me back very quickly and was out to fix the issue in a timely manner. Very knowledgeable and up front with diagnosis and repair.

name: Robert Stewart
text: My experience started when Steve answered the phone.  He was professional, courteous and empathetic. He scheduled my appointment for a tech to arrive within 2 hours of my call. Every minute counts when you're without AC in Alabama in the summer. The tech,  Jeremy, was very friendly,  courteous and professional also. Even more, he was very experienced and quickly diagnosed the issue. Great experience. My recommendation would be to HIRE these guys,  you won't be sorry!

resp.text: Happy to help Robert! Your right - in the heat of Alabama AC is KEY!! Thank you for your 5-star rating!

name: Suzanne Mattox
text: Our AC stopped working Thursday evening. We tried calling several repairmen Friday morning, and no one responded or said that they couldn't do it until next week. Our house was too warm inside and uncomfortable, and we were not looking forward to dealing with heat this coming weekend especially when high temps are in 90s. My husband found this business through the Internet and he contacted them, and they quickly responded. Jacob, one of their technicians, showed up at our house 30 minutes later!  He was able to repair it by replacing a part. He was honest and professional. And, it was affordable to get it repaired!  We were very pleased!  😀

resp.text: We appreciate your 5-star rating!

name: Donald
text:
Kevin Keith did a superb job of analysis, servicing and maintaining of my systems using the most modern tools and techniques. His knowledge, equipment and dedication to his work are first rate.

Kurtis and his team did an excellent job of installing my new HVAC system.  The installation correctly included the use of a vacuum pump and the installation of a liquid line drier.  Then the system was very carefully charged with refrigerant and thoroughly tested.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review and rating Donald!

name: Alan Cashion
text: Everyone that has come out to do maintenance on our system or do any kind of repairs have all been very nice polite and efficient in their work. They also do not leave any kind of mess around for the homeowner to clean up. If you have a problem that you can’t explain to them on the phone they will send out their service manager named Chad Vick. I have also been in contact with Tony who is the one that laid out the system for our new home and he is very knowledgeable about everything that he does.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review Mr. Cashion!

name: Chris Zaragoza
text: 1st time use Skeltons and service was great. The technician, Lee, was great to work with. On time service and fixed problem quickly at fair price. Will definitely use again.

name: Jennifer Hope
text:
Skelton’s is the best! My AC went out and I was so hot and miserable. They sent a tech named John who quickly got my AC back up and running. Thank you so much for the great quality  and professional service!!
~ Jen

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and your business.

name: Bill Simpson
text: The Skelton HVAC serviceman (Jacob) has conducted an extremely thorough Fall and Spring maintenance inspection/service for the past 7 years. He is very customer focused and has demonstrated a keen attention to detail which has kept our system operating at peak performance. I couldn’t ask for better service and support for my HVAC company and appreciate the quality employee that they have provided!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We strive to be the best and provide the best service in the area. Thank you for noticing!

name: Charlie Williams
text: Tech came out at 9:00 pm on a Saturday and fixed our AC.  Service was quick and house was cooling within the hour.  Would definitely recommend Skeltons.

resp.text: We appreciate your 5-star rating! Glad we could get your system back up and running for you!

name: Sheila Murphy
text: I was very pleased with the service I received from Skelton’s. Everyone was professional courteous and efficient. You want quality this is what you will get at the highest level

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words and your business!

name: Joe Glazier
text: Our older unit stopped heating in the dead of winter, just when temps were about to plummet.  Skelton's sent out a repair person to try and get us back going, but the unit's heating coil had burned up.  It was time.  The staff at Skelton's were on site the following morning with a new unit and had it up and running in no time!  These are first rate people who stand behind their products and workmanship!  Skelton's has all of my future business - no questions asked!

resp.text: Thanks for the five-star review! Happy we could help and we look forward to serving you more in the future. Have a great day!

name: James Dailey
text: Shelton Heating & Cooling performed an excellent job in servicing my heat pump today. The technician was on time. The job that he performed was excellent. He kept me informed about his progress. I was provided and estimate of the chargers for my approval before the work started.  I have used their services in the past and plan to use them as needed in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-Star review Mr. Dailey! We appreciate you!

name: Elizabeth Politz
text: Very professional and courteous.  Arrived on time and gave me an estimate of the cost…would definitely recommend Skelton’s to family and friends.

name: Raymond Butler
text: Very good service. Technician was friendly, professional, and thorough and explained all he was doing.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating!

name: SHIRLEY NEELY
text: Kurtis and mark were great! They did a great job on the installation of a new heating and a/c system.

name: Leigh Anne Tucker
text: I’ve used Skelton Heating and Air for years to do routine maintenance and now to replace my AC. They came out within 3 hours when my AC went out. I highly recommend contacting them for your HVAC needs.

resp.text: Happy to help! We appreciate your dedication to Skelton's! Thank you!

name: Chris Robinson
text: It was honestly a really great experience from start to finish. My wife met with Cason and we went into wanting multiple options which i thought were all fairly presented and well explained without any pressure of which to go with. I have a close friend who worked for many years for both Trane and Carrier with many of the dealers throughout Birmingham. He gave me a list of 3 companies he would have out to his home personally. Skelton was one of those, another company that i liked very much, and then one we didnt have a great experience on the quote with. Between Skelton and the other competitor, although Skeltons price was higher we were sold by the labor warranty and some of the other written guarantees, along with the rec from our friend. Installation - I believe it was Mark, my wife was the one on site - went way better than i could have imagined. We arranged last minute to have the unit moved to a new location. All of the work was very well done. I had an idea in my head of what "the aftermath" should have looked like and the equipment involved in the move and all that, and i probably would have been satisfied with a lot less. Its obviously a lot of money for most families, so I was bound to have some mix of buyers remorse and hesitation about whether or not we'd gone with the right people However, when i got home and saw the quality of the work, how neatly and efficiently and professionally everything was done, i immediately felt entirely confident in our decision and knew we had some true professionals out at the house. I think its the first time in my life ive spent that much money on something and dont have any regrets or second guessing about who we chose to spend it with. Kudos to both Cason and Mark's teams. Thanks yall!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Our technicians have our customers satisfaction in mind and we are happy they were able to meet your needs!

name: Kayla Ingram
text: Jacob was on time, professional, and extremely helpful. He replaced the HVAC compressor and answered all of my questions about the process.

resp.text: We are happy to hear our tech was able to help you out. Thank you  for your business.

Not only did they answer they sent a guy out in 30 minutes.  Jacob Avery arrived on time diagnosed the unit in 5 minutes and had my family enjoying cool air within 30 minutes. He was professional and friendly. Skelton Heating is a life saver I recommend them to everyone.

He thoroughly answered EVERY question I had and even had the detailed estimate ready before he left the property! We had previously reached out to a few other companies for the exact situation,
NONE of them went to the extent that Cason did when he was here, not even close. Very pleased with this business all around and look forward to doing business with them!

name: Candi Daugherty
text: John is very professional, knowledgeable and a real asset to your company. In addition, such a genuinely nice person. text: A/C stopped working right before noon today and we could not be happier with the response Skelton's staff delivered.  They were very quick, affordable, and understanding to our needs.  Thanks to Jacob for a job well done.  Skelton's saved the day!!

text: Great experience. The staff was highly responsive and courteous.  They made me feel assured that we were going to be taken care of. They updated me frequently on arrival time. The technician was conscientious (masked up and shoe booties)  and clearly knowledgeable as he was able to diagnose and repair within a pretty short timeframe. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you, Ms. Reese for the wonderful review and that you had a great experience with our staff! We appreciate you choosing Skelton's for your HVAC needs!

name: Al Watkins
text: Excellent service. Have used them for many years. They get the job done and keep the equipment up. One dealer and product you can trust. Take it from me.

resp.text: Mr. Watkins, thank you for leaving such a kind review. We appreciate your business. Merry Christmas!

name: Louis Dina
text: Skelton's Heating, Cooling and Refrigeration just installed a new AC, furnace and air handler in our upstairs attic (difficult job getting it all in an our up a set up rickety pull-down stairs). They were responsive, polite, respectful, did a quality job, were on time and professional in every way. They did a great job cleaning up, like they were never here. They also use Trane equipment which is good quality and highly rated. Their prices were competitive and they did great work. I'm hard to impress, but they impressed me. Thanks for the great job. Oh yeah, 10 year warranty on parts and labor is standard if you pay cash.

name: Rance Pearce
text: Very happy with Skelton’s. They came out today and installed a new 3 unit. They were very polite and very helpful. I would highly recommend them to anyone. They have one happy customer 😂😂

resp.text: Mr. Pearce, thank you for choosing Skelton's for your new install. We appreciate your recommendation!

name: Andy Widener
text:
I don’t write reviews but these guys are really professional. On time; nice tight work; the installers took pride in their work & cleaned up afterward. Salesman was clear, precise & brief - no wasted time “up-selling”. We got what we needed & got it installed quickly - less than 3 hours.

I was surprisingly pleased (as I am usually cynical about such endeavors).

resp.text: Mr. Widener, thank you for the excellent review. We are pleased to know that you had a great experience using Skelton's for your HVAC install!

name: Michelle Gigis
text: Excellent experience with Skelton's! The technician was very thorough and discussed all the options with me. He was professional and extremely knowledgeable. This is now my go to company for all of my heating, cooling and refrigeration needs. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Ms. Gigis, thank you for taking the time to give Skelton's an amazing review! We strive to give our customer's an excellent experience and are happy to hear that you were pleased!

name: David Reed
text: Great maintenance service for the money and worth it to prevent unplanned downtime. Very methodical in their service and you need to take care of your 5-10k$ investment so it can take care of your family! No pushy sales games and they take care of your property.

resp.text: We appreciate you choosing Skelton's Heating & Air, David! So happy you are letting us take care of your investment. Let us know if you need anything!

name: Patrick McDonald
text: I had scheduled an estimate on Wednesday, June 10 8-9 a.m. Estimator showed up on Thursday, 8 a.m. to perform the estimate. Estimate was done without measuring, or even going under the house. I have zero confidence that the estimate is accurate; I felt like the estimator was simply seeing how much he could get out of me. No detail on the estimate i received. Just got the total dollar figure that seems about 3x higher than it should be. With the time he spent, he really pulled the numbers out of his hat (or some other place).

resp.text: Thank you Patrick for your feedback. We are very sorry that your recent experience was not a pleasant one. We strive to provide great service and when we fall short of this we try to do everything we can to resolve the issue. Again, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and hope you will give us another chance to make things right. Please give us a call at 205-991-5878 and ask for Chad.

text: They were fantastic. I can't recommend highly enough.

name: Rebekah Rogers
text: Overall the best experience I've had with a heating/cooling company. I thought we had a big issue but our coils just needed cleaning. The receptionist was friendly and professional; my only issue was that I told her I wouldn't be available before 2pm and the technician was there well before 2pm. But otherwise a very good experience! Definitely will be using them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and choosing Skelton’s Heating and Air as your service company. I apologize for the technician arriving a little before 2 if it was an inconvenience to you! Again, I am greatful for you choosing Skelton’s and the overall experience was excellent!

name: jorge rodriguez
text: I called skeletons on Wednesday to fix my thermostat they send a technician there the next day to diagnose the problem. The technician arrive on time and he found the problem in less than five minutes. He Answer all my  questions. If you looking for a good reliable company call Skelton’s You won’t be disappointed

text: I did my homework and found Skelton to be not only the least expensive, but they were so helpful, on time, cleaned up after completing the job and hauled away the old unit for me. text: Everyone at skeletons was extremely professional   and did exactly what they said they were going to do would definitely recommend skeletons to do work.

name: Louis Dina
text: My 15 year old AC unit was recharged about 5 weeks ago. When it stopped working again, I assumed all the Freon leaked out again and that it needed replacement. I asked Skelton’s to give a quote on a replacement unit. Their technician was very thorough and discovered a bad switch and capacitor, which he replaced on the spot. He checked our Freon levels and said they were still perfect. His extra effort and honesty saved us from having to buy a new unit at this time, even though he could have easily convinced me we needed a new unit. (Two other companies also provided quotes on new units, but neither of them discovered the underlying issue.) Honesty and integrity, and a desire to serve the customer’s best interests, are important to me. Skelton’s proved it by their actions. When it is time for a replacement AC system, I’ll call Skelton’s.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience! We appreciate the review and your business.

name: Connor Vintson
text: Can’t recommend this company enough. David went above and beyond to make sure the problem was fixed. They work fast and are VERY trustworthy. 5 stars.

resp.text: Thank you Connor for the wonderful review and for choosing Skelton's for your HVAC needs!

name: Jay Miller
text:
My 94 year old Dad's AC system went out on a Thursday afternoon in rural Alabama with the heat index well over 100. Justin promptly called me back and was out to check the system before the end of business that same day. The entire system had to be replaced so it couldnt be resolved that day. Justin lined up Wes and his crew so that they could begin the replacement first thing once the system was delivered. I was told everything would be good to go by 1pm. My Dad and I arrived at 12pm and Wes told me all they needed was access to the thermostat and they would be finished. This group understood the critical situation my Dad was in and went above and beyond to make sure his unit was installed and operating ASAP.
Thank you so much guys...you'll never know how much it meant to my Dad to get back to his home.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Miller for the great review! We are happy to hear about your that you were pleased with job and technicians. Thanks again for choosing Skelton's Heating & Air.

name: Goodoz
text: David showed up on same day as original call and diagnosed my problem.  He priced and ordered a part for me (collected payment) and arrived back at my home first thing the next morning.  AC was back on by 10AM.  Skelton replaced my upstairs AC a few years back and did a good job (crew began and finished same day)...so I called them back for this repair...another good experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and choosing Skelton's Heating & Air for your HVAC needs!

name: Jack Lyle
text:
It seems punctuality is lost on many service businesses these days, but that's not the case with Skelton's!  They arrived when they said they would for a quote on a new heating and a/c system and did the same two days later when they came to install my new system.

I was very pleased with the pricing for a new system and the installation was performed by a professional crew who put pride in their work.  They did not try to sell me things that I didn't need and there were no surprises.
I paid exactly what I was quoted.

They will  get all my HVAC work from now on.  I highly recommend Skelton's!

name: Doug Tilt
text:
I remodeled a room in my lake house which required repositioning the main intake vent from a vertical in -wall position to an in-floor register.  Brian Skelton , company owner, came out the day after my call, evaluated the job and provided a best guess estimate for the proposed task
The following day a team of two technicians  arrived at 0800 , as agreed. Within 4 hours the old vent box was removed, a new floor frame between the joists was constructed, a new box placed and large duct connected to the existing AC/ Heating unit and new ,sturdy floor grate placed( and thermostat repositioned)

The Skelton team were most professional and efficient.  The job site was completely cleaned and everything double checked to be sure everything was done to my satisfaction and functioning well. An immediate follow up call to me by company owner was appreciated.

The total cost was $960.00 based on labor and materials , which was as expected per initial estimate

My five star rating was completely deserved based on professionalism, punctuality, job done, and charge. I definitely recommend this company and will use them again.

Doug Tilt

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review for our company! It was our pleasure to assist you on your project.

name: seraphimr
text:
We have a quadriplegic living here and one of our central units,  the one in his suite, stopped colling last night. He is temperature sensitive and it is critical to keep his temperature stable in his area. I called SHELTON Air and Heat, this is Saturday morning,  and John a Technician answered.  I explained the situation, told him the model number of out Trane unit. He said he was on his way to a call and come after. Hff e called and ssid he was on his way. He arrived,  called to tell me and I told him i wiuld be diwn in 5 minutes  and told him which of the 5 Trane units it was. I was worried about the length of time hff e would be here an DC tge cost, especially since it was a weekend. I came down, not over 5 minutes later, he was replacing the capacitor on the unitand was finished 5 minutes later!
John was courteous,  honest, trustworthy,  and prompt. He could  have taken his time, running up labor time but just did his job efficiently.
I will definitely be using Skeleton Heating and Air for or all my AC/HEATING needs. . Thank you Mr. Skelton for having honest and efficient technicians!  Thank you John fir getting the unit up nb and runing so quickly!

resp.text: Glad to hear about your experience! We appreciate you taking the time to submit this review and are pleased to hear more of these stories about our technicians. Let us know if you need anything else and thanks again for your business.

name: Sparkle McGhee
text:
I just bought a home after last Christmas, so this summer is my first in my house and the very first time using the AC, it didn't work. My home warranty company called Turnkey Heating and Air, and a guy named Chris came out the day after my request was put in. I have a son who is a heart baby with Trisomy 21, and he has a fragile immune system and he cant get really hot, or be anywhere with the temperate being to warm for him. Chris was able to fix the issue the same day he came out, and advised the AC had to much coolant. He leveled it out for me and we got a new filter, and cool air was immediate!

A day after the issue was resolved, a leak appeared in my garage and and I had to make another call. Logan came out this time and had to replace my condenser box. Issue fixed!! Both of these guys were great!! They were friendly, informative, and took great care of the issues for me in less than an hour when they were at the house. If you are looking for great, timely service, be sure to give TurnKey Heating and Air a call.  Chris and Logan, you guys are awesome. I hope I am spelling your names right, and your supervisor see this review.

name: Brian Smith
text: Turn Key was on time and very efficient with their time while on site.  Even went out of their way to provide maintenance tips that no other HVAC Company has ever done (probably dealt with 4 or 5 in multiple states).  They will definitely be doing all of our HVAC work from now on!

name: HSC Handyman
text:
Our A/C went out on Wednesday afternoon. I waited for my father-in-law to try to help me with finding a compressor/condenser and installing it for me. Thursday evening I spoke to Mr. Billy. I called Mrs. Frances Friday morning and by 3:00 pm Saturday I had a complete inside/outside Trane heat pump system installed and working. The tech even stayed for a while to make certain everything was working properly.
We weren't expecting this expense and didn't have enough money to make this all happen. "No problem!", says Mr. Billy. He told me about a financing option through Alabama Power. Mrs. Frances got it all taken care of and now we have cold reliable air in the summer and look forward to having hot and more affordable heat this winter.
Thank you so much Mr. Billy and Turn Key for a "Chick-Fil-A" experience with what began as a dreadful situation facing 90 degree temps with no A/C and no way to afford it on our own. Great Job!!!

name: Dylan Hein
text: I can't imagine letting these men in my house after the way they acted so disrespectful on the interstate today.  One of their service vans was camped in the left lane, doing 10mph under the speed limit,  blocking traffic for miles.  When I motioned for them to move over so we could pass, both occupants of the vehicle smiled and waved.  They did this repeatedly, but refused to move.  Simply taunting me and those behind me.  After I was able to pass them by switching lanes several times, they proceeded to speed up and slow down, pull up next to me and both smile and wave.  Again, just being as disrespectful as possible, all while still refusing to move from the passing lane.  I called their office and received no answer during posted business hours.  People who are disrespectful enough to hold up a quarter million people and then taunt them while doing it, will be coming nowhere NEAR my home.  Absolutely atrocious the way Birmingham was just treated.  DO NOT PATRONIZE!!!!  COMPLETELY DISRESPECTFUL.  I'll continue to spread the word about this company until I'm notified of these two employees receiving disciplinary action.  If they do not, then obviously this company condones disrespect and gives us even more reason to never patronize them.  If and when I'm notified and shown proof of such discipline, I'll update this review with the company's statement and APOLOGY.

Now, I have to start all over with another company because I won't be giving this one a dime of my money.  There are too many other options in Alabaster to deal with SUB-PAR customer service. text: Great staff, highly informative

name: Ken Bryars
text: Came home from church to a warm house ... air running but not cooling. Called Island Air (on a Sunday) ... the technician called to let me know he had me in his queue ... would be there in about an hour. Came and discovered a small frog had grounded the capacitor in the outside unit which fried the capacitor and frog. Replaced the capacitor, and had my A/C back up and running. Island Air exceeded my expectation, and was very pleased with the timely service and quick diagnostic/repair ... I give them 5 stars!

name: Patty King
text: As always, quality workmanship. The gentleman explained what he had done, and why.   Will use again and recommend to others.  Thank you.

name: Blake Norris
text: Our 21 year old ac bit the dust in July and the crew at Island Air had us up and running within 48 hours of us contacting them. They had quite a few options available to us that they walked us through the process. The unit they installed has been going strong for a year now. It controls humidity so we don’t keep the air as low as we used to which saves $$ on the power bill.  Professional and expeditious. Would recommend them to anyone!

name: Eric Bradley
text: Showed up when we couldn’t find anyone else to get serviced. Technician was there within a couple hours and fixed the problem and had great suggestions for future problems. Great experience!

name: James Pearse
text: Very prompt with regard to appointment time.  Technician was very polite and knowledgeable.  Researched system to identify problem as well as other, non critical item that was not impacting system performance at present or in future.  We are a new customer to Island Air and definitely use them for future HVAC needs.  Highly recommend Island Air to anyone having the need for. AC services.  Condo Owner at Phoenix on the Bay!

name: Angela Wiley
text: Amazing service!  Had a tech in my area who actually came the same day. Tech did a fantastic job and the price was more than fair.

name: Missy Tyler
text: Island Air has been our Heating & Air Conditioning company for over a decade on two properties. When we have needed repairs, their team members show up and repair things quickly.  New installations have been great experiences too. In the heat of the Summer we walk into our cool home and say, “Thank you, Island Air!”

name: Charlene Harris
text: Happy to do business with Island AC and Heating. They were on time and the gentleman that showed up was polite.  We were hit hard by “Sally” , the hurricane. We had some Sheetrock hung and he noticed there was no return air vent. So I went to a department store and purchased a return air grill.  So glad they sent Jason!!!

name: Tina Greene
text: Travis and Jason are my heroes!!  A/c went out in our condo with guests staying there. They went above and beyond, tracked down the part we needed and air was working within 7 hours of the initial phone call this morning.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

name: Don Sterling
text: Well done! Called Friday afternoon with an AC unit not cooling. Despite the late hour, Jennifer still found time to dispatch a crew to my house before the weekend. Jayson arrived about a half hour later. He found the problem within minutes, replacing a faulty capacitor. I’m very grateful for their rapid response time and quick turnaroud time. Thanks again!

name: Cody Hall
text: Great job! Steven was the most helpful AC guy I have ever been around. This experience was an educational one and I would recommend him to anyone struggling with AC issues.

name: Anna Santos
text: My tech was very knowledgeable. This is the only company I have use for more than 20 years. The service has only gotten better.

name: Don Kilbourne
text: They have the best service department and service advisors in Baldwin County.  The field team and their management have superior technically expertise, and they can explain their diagnostics and solutions clearly in everyday language.

name: Brenda Westby
text: The motor went out on our HVAC. They came after hours to try get it running. They were prompt and professional and had it ordered, repaired, and running a day earlier than we expected because of the 4th of July weekend. Highly recommend this company!

name: Ben Emerson
text: I deal in Real Estate and use island air exclusively. They sent two technicians Cody and Travis out to diagnose an issue with my downstairs ac. They arrived 5 min before the appointment. Spent 15 min diagnosing the issue. Fixed and then Explained the problem to me and layer out how to handle the unit in the future. It was raining so as the lead guy is talking to me the other tech swept up the dirt they tracked in from going in and out. Five stars, 20 out of 10 would reccomend to anyone.

name: Shiva Harney
text:
Dependable. It’s a number 1 problem in many home service business as repair, installation, building, renovation, etc.
They will call if they are running late but normally on time.
Did a great job on many area we needed a service for.
Highly recommend this company.

name: Allison Eastland
text: Quick service on fairly short notice.  Jason was quick to address our problem and give us a reasonable solution.  Recommend them highly!

text: Once again, Island Air to the rescue! Turned on the AC for the first time since Sally repairs last year, but nothing happened. Called Island Air (my go-to for all things HVAC), expecting the worst. Diagnosis? Wiring had been disconnected when damaged crawlspace insulation was replaced after Sally. Prompt, dependable, reliable and honest. GS and OB are fortunate to have them. Thanks, guys.

name: Steven Schaming
text: The A/C stopped working about 4:00 pm on a 90° Saturday. I called Island Air and Jason the tech called me back in 5 minutes. He gave me a tip to get the A/C running again until he could get here, (which worked!)  and he was here in about an hour and a quarter. He took care of the problem and checked the unit over in about a half hour. We’ll done!

name: Rosa Turner
text:
Came within 2 hours of me calling on a Friday afternoon. Resigned to thinking I would have to suffer all weekend (and Monday being Labor Day)! It was 88 degrees in the house at this time. Did not have the equipment to fix the problem on Friday. Another employee came this morning and got my AC up and running in less than an hour. Temperature went from 91 to 86 in about 20min. Still dropping. It was an awful night. Slept with the back door open and 3 ceiling fans running continuously. Never take cool/cold air for granted in the summertime at the beach!
Both young men were sympathetic, friendly, and professional. Would recommend Island Air to anyone. They were recommended to me by a neighbor.

text: Always on time. Always efficient. Been a customer fir 11 years. Stand behind their work. Have had a couple issues but they ALWAYS made it right!!

text: I have relied on Island Air for over ten years to take care of my HVAC issues at our condo in Orange Beach. They are prompt, knowledgeable and professional.

name: Brandon Hanks
text: New customer with Island Air. They have a comprehensive maintenance program servicing HVAC systems. Angie answered all my questions and provided insight on specific tests performed.

name: Paula Pierce
text:
My system stopped cooling,  on a hot August day. I called to set up an appointment. Island Air came within the hour and replaced a battery in my system. They were very nice, and fixed my problem immediately!!

Today is Friday, June 26, 2020. I called to set up an annual check on my heat/air system. Island Air sent Ricky to our house and the service was great! He explained and answered any questions we had. He found moisture build up, black gunk, growing. We immediately requested him to install a filtration system, that he recommended. This will kill any growth and filter the air.  A definite plus when you have a lung condition!  We are very appreciative that Island  Air Employees are well trained, kind, efficient,  and care about their customers!! Thanks Ricky for going the extra mile! We will definitely breathe better
tonight!!

Tom and Paula Pierce

text: Our AC unit quit cooling after a thunderstorm. Island Air was called this morning about 9:00am.  The technician arrived at 11:15, reset the system, checked the operational parameters to assure continued operation, and was complete by noon.  Very knowledgeable, professional, and thorough.

text: Bought a service contract with Island Air and they came out to do a maintenance service. Scott was wonderful, did a great job explaining everything and completed the job perfectly. Glad I got a service contract with them! Thanks

Very responsive, professional and thorough

Fabulous from start to finish. Highly recommend!!

Air check, Freeon

text: Wonderful! HVAC was on the fritz and I had guests that needed a working A/C. The tech was out there within 2 hours and had it fixed (clogged drain line) within just a few minutes. Got in touch with miss Julie in the office after Hurricane Sally. She had a tech out the same day to diagnose and fix my AC unit. Even with the chaos of the hurricane, Island Air was courteous, professional and had the grit to make sure they were going the extra mile to get customers' lives back to normal.

The technicians Jayson and Greg were also professional, knowledgeable, and a joy to interact with. I am a new customer to Island Air and will be sticking with them for my HVAC needs. Thank you for all the work you are doing to restore the modern amenities we often take for granted. I will highly recommend Island Air to anyone else needing HVAC services.

Jeremy Russow

So, after being here a few weeks and having a guest stay and tell me how hot it is, I call to ask Island Air to see what is the problem, since they were the ones who said it worked great.
Well, of course, they won't come out and inspect without paying Another fee!😡
Needless to say, don't trust their word because evidently it is no good. Now I have an ac unit that does not work properly, after they told me it did. And, I have to pay someone to fix it!!😡😡😡

name: Leigh Scott
text:
We are building a new house. Our building contractor recommended Island Air-Air Conditioning and Heating, Gulf Shores, AL. My husband and I previously lived in several homes with HVAC problems stemming from poor design and installations. We knew we wanted to avoid those with new construction.

I initially met with Rob Barnas of Island Air to explain our HVAC desires. Rob and Chris designed a plan to address the "wants & needs" of our system. It's very easy to install flexible ducts improperly, but Eddie and the men ran the ducts and attached the air handlers with great care.

New HVAC systems are very expensive. I did not want to buy a new system and suffer the same issues that we had to pay to have repaired in previous houses. So, throughout the construction process I asked dozens of questions.  I'm sure this was tiresome for Island Air, but they were very patient with me. Honestly, how can anyone be expected to properly operate and care for a system unless they understand how it's supposed to work? Hahahaha. Also, I wanted to understand the system while I could still see the components. Our drywall is not up yet. We are now 4 months into construction, so not far enough along to have thermostats installed or have the system turned on. However, we are enough along for me to say I am happy this far with the work done by Island Air of Gulf Shores, AL. I will try to post again after we move in to give everyone a final report on how it feels to live in an HVAC system built by Island Air.

PS. In case you are wondering. I am not related by blood or personal connections to anyone at Island Air and have received no discounts or other incentives for posting this review.
D. Scott
Gulf Shores, AL

name: Nautical Star
text: My first experience with this company was in 2014 when I asked them to install an AC system to my downstairs add on.  The initial job was well done.  I was happy with the work that I entered a service agreement for my upstairs unit. In 2016 my trust with the company was severely damaged when the AC tech charged me for the part that was still under warranty and I had to call them on it.  To the company credit, they did "refund" me with the credit on the next repair job in the spring of 2017.  I paid the invoice without examining it carefully as I should have done.  Two months in late May of 2017, I received a letter from the Baldwin County small claim court saying that Island  Air is suing me for nonpayment.  I called them and the manager told me that all this can go away if I pay them at that point.  I went home and dug up all my paperwork and found out that they overcharged me once again on the visit in spring 2017.  I faxed them my receipts and called them the next day and advised them not to go ahead with the lawsuit because they will not win in court.  They rescinded the the court claim and offered me a six month maintenance complimentary service for my inconvenience,  but after all the shenanigans I have to walk away.  The trust factor is no longer there.  I waited for four months to write this review to make sure that my emotion is in check and to give them a fair review about my experience with the company.   Take home points?  Save your receipts and you need to know about the warranty your AC system.  Always go check the charges line by line and make sure to keep this company honest.  They will take advantage of your ignorance.

name: Jason Workman
text:
Can’t vouch for their work because they never came out on two scheduled appointments. Was supposed to arrive at 11. I called them at 11:10 and no answer.  They called at 11:50 and said they got caught up would the afternoon be ok around 3-3:30. I said sure. It’s 5:30 and haven’t heard from them. Called Someone else names Valley and they will be there tomorrow. Hoping for a better experience. (correction) They showed up at 5:35 but by this time we had already scheduled another vendor to come out.

-in response to the post, we didn't live there then and this was our first experience with your organization.

name: Kaytlen Welch
text: They charged us $150 for a $20 part, and when my husband called to politely ask why, the man who answered the phone was very rude. I've worked customer service. The way he talked to and treated my husband, who was politely asking a simple question, was disrespectful and not acceptable. The first thing he said after my husband asked was, "Oh, so you're going to tell me how to run my business?" No, sir, but it was a question you should expect if you put all the charges listed underneath the part cost. Yes, $150 was for labor and mileage, as was the $50 you listed as the service charge, but if that's what you were charging $150 for, you should write that down on the list of charges. Not rudely speak to a customer who was asking a question. Not everyone has money to throw around willy nilly. We would like to know why we were charged so much--NOTHING wrong with that. We will not go back here ever again. Especially after he threatened to take away the 30 day warranty for this $150 part.

name: Auston Smith
text:
A/C went out in the middle of summer. Hot as balls. Dude came the same day and had it fixed in like 20 minutes.  Pretty reasonable price, too.

Would recommend.

name: stephen williams
text: I am actually looking for quotes to check my a.c. and after reading these reveiws, he should be shut down. With only 2 people that would recommend were fake reviews, which is sad.... Learn how to treat customers, respect, honesty, math, and manners before dealing with anyone else.

name: Hingelszveld
text:
They say revenge is a dish best served cold. I guess my heating unit got its revenge on me last month. During the throes of Alabama's three day Winter last month, my unit crapped out on me. It took me a few minutes to chisel the ice off of my phone, but then I was able to give these guys a call. Not only did they brave the snowpocalypse to bring me glorious, wonderful, Promethian fire, but they also didn't charge me a convenience fee. If you are hot or cold and wish to be the opposite, give these friendly folks a call.

11/10 would recommend.

name: John Higby
text: Been a Customer for many years, but service over the last few months has really gone downhill.  They recently replaced a package heat pump, should have been an easy change out, the job was anything but.  Took much time, trips, rework (and expense for Climatemp) to get a job completed.  I also have annual maintenance agreements for two residences (been in effect many years also),  the latest visit was scheduled between 1 and 3 yesterday, they never showed or called, I got a call this morning telling me it was scheduled for 8-10 this morning, this was the final straw, I told them to cancel the maintenance contract for both residences and refund the remainder.  Evidently the contract is non-refundable.  I have been a Customer for almost 10-years, but these latest experiences will have me looking elsewhere for my HVAC business.

name: Dena Yearwood
text: I would highly recommend Service Tech, Inc. for any HVAC service needs.   My experience of working with them has been outstanding and positive beginning with Tara in the office for scheduling and then with Tony on site for preventative maintenance/service.  Richie is a reputable and personable leader that has a great crew assisting him in taking care of families throughout Birmingham and in the surrounding areas.  We have been loyal and satisfied customers of Service Tech, Inc. for over 6 years.

resp.text: Richie says, congratulations on your new home Dena. And that he appreciates the opportunity to take care of your families HVAC needs over the years.

name: Jennifer Roe
text: We’ve used Service Tech for our home and business since 1995. Our A/C unit reached the end of its life late on a Friday. The owner, Richie Vines, was here by 8am Saturday morning, two hours after we called. He got our unit working in 95 degree weather till we were able to replace it. We worked with sales, Steve Burns, who gave us numerous options for replacement. The installation technicians, Robert and Von, were incredibly professional and knowledgeable. We replaced both our A/C and furnace with Trane equipment. It’s completely solved our problem of hearing 2 floors with only 1 unit. The thermostat works from either the control pad or an app. Everyone in our family is really happy with the results and the service was outstanding!

resp.text: We are so glad that everyone in your family is happy. We will let Robert & Von know how well they did, as well as the owner Richie Vines. Service Tech, Inc. really values your feedback and looks forward to continuing the great relationship that we have established over the years. Warm regards, Team Service Tech, Inc.

name: George Stewart
text: I had my two heating systems inspected and maintained by a Service Tech technician. He brought with him a new preventive maintenance system with temperature meters that attached to return and supply registers which would feed an analysis software app on his phone and prepare a report for me. I have not yet received this report but was told that my cooling systems were okay ( not sure why this was done this time of year). He also told me that my upstairs thermostat was not working properly in heat mode and thought it might need to be replaced. I pointed out to him that is recently replaced as new in June 2020 and said that it was installed by my son at that time. We looked at the installation and he discovered that a wire jumper that powers the heating mode was missing. After helping him by holding a light to illuminate the terminal strip, he installed the jumper and the thermostat heating system came on.

resp.text: Thank you George for your review.  We appreciate your business.  Please contact us if you have any other issues.

name: robert bashinsky
text: The work was good and results were satisfactory. The crew was to rip out the damaged duct work, replace it and clean the HVAC unit. This was done, but the only complaints I had were they did not cover the vents and returns before the removal of the old moldy ducts. Thus the rooms became full of a moldy smell. They did stop and come cover the vents and returns, but they did not have any painters tape to apply to the walls. Fortunately I had some painters tape to loan to them. Other than those two lapses I had no complaints. The foreman was courteous and helpful and I would use Service Tech again if needed.

resp.text: Mr. Bashinsky, we apologize that we failed to cover the vents and returns initially. We are fortunate that you loaned us your painters tape. Team work makes the dream work, right??! Our team will pass this information on so that we have all of the supplies we need in the future. Your feedback has been quite helpful and we look forward to a continued business relationship with you. Sincerely, Team Service Tech, Inc.

resp.text: Thank you Marcus for allowing us to service and repair the package unit for you. Glad we found the problems on the ductwork. Call us if you have any problems or questions. Pleasure meeting you,Richie Vines Pres.

name: Bill Hampton
text: If you have any air conditioning or heating needs do not hesitate to call Service Tech.  My technician showed up on time, and was very friendly and professional.  He resolved my issue in a timely fashion, and I haven't had any issues since.  The next time I need an HVAC company there will only be one company that I will call.  Thank you Service Tech!

resp.text: You are welcome! Bill Hampton, we greatly appreciate your recommendation! We hope to continue to provide excellent service each and every time!

name: Christie Neely
text:
Service Tech did everything they could for several years keeping our old HVAC system working for us.  It was old and dying.  When we finally got to the point of no return, Richie Vines gave us several options for a new system.  His technicians were in and out in one day.  They were extremely professional and knowledgeable.

Richie told us to watch the power bill graph, and he was so right.  Our bill was cut by almost 50% over the same time the previous year.  The new system is running smoothly, we are paying less, and we couldn't be happier with the system, service, and management at Service Tech!  They are who to call if you need help.

resp.text: Richie has always taken pride in being reliable and dependable for all of the customers of Service Tech, Inc. The excitement in knowing that your power bill was cut by almost 50% is just one way that our staff tries to exceed our customers expectations. We appreciate you all for being our valued customers over the years, Christie. Thank you for this positive feedback!

name: Crystal Daigle
text: Outstanding service! My AC stopped cooling in the dead of summer on a Sunday. The owner Richie came over himself with his lovely wife Annette and their adorable dog. He's extremely knowledgeable and took the time to teach me about the problems responsible for the current issue, and how to troubleshoot problems that could arise in the future. He was honest, didn't try to up sale me anything I didn't need, and fixed the problem without having to replace the entire unit which saved me thousands of dollars. He went above and beyond, even changing the air filter in my house himself. Apparently his company does much more than HVAC repairs, and I'll absolutely be going to them first for all my contracting needs in the future. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Crystal Daigle, your positive feedback is greatly appreciated. Service Tech, Inc. looks forward to a long lasting business relationship with you.

text: I've used Service Tech for about 7-8 years. Their technicians have always taken the extra step to inform me about why I've had heating and AC problems. I recently remodeled and had a different company move my unit and had problems with the quality of work. Service Tech came out and did a great job "optimizing" what the other company did. I'll be calling them for everything in the future. Great people/great work.

resp.text: Service Tech, Inc. appreciates your loyalty, positive feedback, and your business, Randy Glick. We look forward to a lasting business relationship with you!

text: I have no complaints about this company. They have never failed to respond the same day I called them. It it could be fixed, they fixed it. I did it because I appreciate having someone who takes such good care of us. They deserve the review.

name: Roger Rendleman
text: We give Chris, the technician a five star.  The company unfortunately a three star.  Not sure where the poor communication is between answering and dispatch.  Answering was very pleasant but ineffective.  Very, very, very  long story but thank goodness we got Chris' direct number or our get away weekend would have been disastrous.  First, get the answering service worked out.  Second, get guys like Chris more help on the weekends or you are going to lose great employees.  Oh, give Chris a raise.  He didn't ask; he was just that awesome. We had such an incredible experience with this company the first time; so this was a disappointment.

resp.text: We are sorry about the delay. We ran over 40 emergency calls over the weekend. We'll discuss the issues with our answering service. We are just so glad we were able to get you cooling. Yes Chris is one of our top notch technicians and we definitely need more help!

name: Jon Cotton
text:
SOLID!!!!
Service Air has been servicing our two units since we've lived in Daphne (2015).  They came highly recommended after we had to dismiss another company for price gouging labor cost.  Recently they came to my house for service and pointed out some leaks during a bi-annual service and recommended I make a home warranty claim.  I made claim and a Home Warranty A/C contractor (not Service Air) came out and stated I needed new air handler and compressor.  Home Warranty A/C contractor (not Service Air) also tried to charge me a TON of uncovered cost. I contacted Service Air and reviewed my cost.  Service Air agreed to help me out for a entire new unit instead of piece by piece repairing my upstairs unit.  Along the way, Glen saved me money by explaining why I didn't need some systems, but would be better off with other.  All of Service Air's techs were highly professional and courteous.  Thanks a 2.5 ton to Service Air and all their techs for a great job.  I will be sticking with them and highly recommend them for your AC/H needs.

name: Gina Eudy
text: We had the worst experience ever with this company. We bought a new unit and it didn’t work as soon as the installers left. We called them back several times to correct the problem and it has been improperly installed the entire time! We had a huge water leak this past year and had to vacate our home for a month. The owner accepted full responsibility when he saw the air handler wasn’t even installed right. My insurance company had already been contacted at that point so they paid the claim minus our $1000 deductible. Now Service Air Eastern Shore have changed their minds and decided they weren’t going to accept liability anymore. So, we are out our deductible and our insurance premiums have already went up $1000 this year. Very disappointed with this company’s customer service and the unqualified installers.  They had an opportunity to do the right thing and didn’t.

resp.text: We replaced your old inside unit on 5-16-2016. At this time we recommended replacing your outside unit. You declined. On 3-23-2017 you had us replace your outside unit. Your system performed normally. On 5-30-2019, 3 years after the inside unit was installed, the drain line clogged up. Your other AC system, which sits adjacent to this system in the attic, had recently been replaced by another company. We found the drain lines had been disconnected. We corrected this problem and added two new safety switches to your drain and pan. Your insurance company contacted ours and had the event investigated. The insurance company determined that Service Air was not at fault. Your system was installed correctly and we never said otherwise.

name: Christine Martin
text:
At 1:30 pm, my ac went kaput. I called Service Air, and Mr. Glen was at my house before 2 pm. I could not be more pleased with the entire experience; you earned a loyal customer today! Thank you!

Update 06/04/19: My ac unit finally bit the dust for good on a late Saturday evening, of course, and I immediately thought of Service Air. We called them at 8 am the next morning, they were here by 10:30 am, and we had a completely new heating and air system at a very reasonable price by 7 pm that same evening. I cannot recommend this company highly enough. They have unbeatable customer service, great employees, and do quality work at affordable prices. When I said they had won me as a customer for life, I meant it! Thank you, Service Air!

Service Air Eastern Shore Team

name: Cynthia Harkness
text:
We have used thia business for years. Our latest experience was not the best. Needed a compressor in our HVAC unit. They came out Weds., said we can put it in Fri. We said we had a commitment then, and we agreed on Monday. This house is 45 min. from our home and is to be sold. Monday comes, my husband leaves early to be there at the agreed time. I am about 20 minutes out, and they call and said they did not have the compressor. FORGOT to go pick it up in BHAM. So.... Could they come Min. after noon? Good thing they talked to me and not my gusband!
I questioned the charge, and was told the tech had figured the amount of coolant wrong, and that coolant is sold to the consumer at a price above $65 a lb.
Enough said. One bad experience does not scare us away, but definitely we will proceed with caution.

resp.text: Mrs. Harkness,  I am terribly sorry you were inconvenienced by our company on 10/7/2019.  We did call you that morning and admitted that we had forgotten to pick up your compressor on the previous Friday.  We explained our mistake and let you know the time we would be at your home for the repair.  This was an unfortunate situation and again we apologize for the inconvenience it caused you.

If you will get butt hurt by 1 dissatisfied customer and be rude to them on a public forum, then the public deserves to know who you are and what your company is about. Hope this issue is fixed as it was a couple of years ago. Have a good day Susan!

name: Andrew Chancellor
text:
Great service, quick and very reasonably priced.  The only call you'll need for all your HVAC needs!

I called these guys up a few weeks ago late in the afternoon because my Air Conditioner wasn't cooling very efficiently and sometimes not at all.  I figured the worst because my A/C unit was about 20 years old and that I was going to have to drop $8,000 into a new unit.  I called them up and they said they'd have a guy out there first thing the next morning!

Their technician showed up before 9:00AM and began diagnosing my HVAC system.  In a couple hours he had gone through the cooling system from top to bottom and performed their Preventative Maintenance service on my A/C unit and it was cooling as if it were brand new.  The tech was very polite and thorough in diagnosing the issue and did an excellent job answering all my questions.  We talked a little bit about the cost of replacing the unit and what he would recommend but in no way was trying to push a sale on me.

The price for the service he performed was well below what I was expecting to pay.  These guys have certainly outdone themselves in this industry and they will be my sole source for all my HVAC needs.  I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Andrew. It makes us feel good to know people trust and respect our work. Let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.

name: BlacKnight 1
text:
Great HVAC company! The owner, Shane, is very personable and the kind of guy you can trust with your door unlocked. Opie (dead ringer for a younger Ron Howard), his technician, is a relatively young guy (23), but mature beyond his years and a very good HVAC tech. He's also trustworthy and the kind of guy you would want to represent your company. Most importantly, he was able to diagnose my heat pump problem quickly and efficiently...10 to 15 minutes. The HVAC was over amped.

The company that installed my TRANE XL14 heat pump in 2007, Alabama Climate Control (ACC) of Huntsville, apparently did not notice that the heat pump was rated for max amperage of 40 amps because they did not bother to change the 50 amp circuit breaker in the panel in the garage. One would expect a professional HVAC company to do a basic electrical circuit check/test to ensure the electrical circuit is compatible with your NEW heat pump...right!?!?

Anyway, this oversight by ACC resulted in a fried circuit breaker in the junction box at the heat pump. Opie said we were lucky this situation did not result in a burned up motor or worse a burned down house. After all that, Opie tried to give me a $25 discount because I'm a veteran.

Thank you for the sentiment Opie, but also thank you for identifying a problem that has caused me great anguish over the years. I had to replace 3 or 4 compressors on the original heat pump (a Rheem) about 15 years ago when we first started renting out the house.

The HVAC company (same ACC) kept replacing all those compressors under warranty at $250 to $300 a pop for labor, but just couldn't figure out what was causing all those compressors to burn up (the same 50 amp circuit breaker in the breaker box). Then, I was dumb enough to hire them again to install a new TRANE in 2007. Remeber, the TRANE is rated for a maximum of 40 amps, but ACC left the same old 50 amp circuit breaker in the breaker panel. Voila...we get a fried junction box this time.

Incredible...that it took a young 23 year old tech with a lot less experience (but more common sense and intelligence) to recognize that a 50 amp circuit breaker is going to eventually cause some problems if it is not compatible with the rest of the circuit.

The cautionary tale here is...be extremely vigilant and careful about who you let work on your electrical systems and watch them like a hawk when they do...until you find a company like SMS that has techs like Opie.. Thank you SMS and Opie for saving my house from a potential fire.

name: Olivia Hardy
text: My husband went to the back to buy a blower unit for the inside part of our A/C. When he got there he found out that they don't sell them as a unit like they used to. You have to buy just the motor, so that's what he bought. When he gets it home, he finds out that it didn't have mount brackets so I went up there to get one that does. I was then told that none of the motors come with bracket mounts. I made the comment that he should have told my husband that so he could have gotten it while he was there. It's hot and this is our A/C unit we're trying to fix in the middle of a hot day. The gentleman said it wasn't his job to know what a person knew or not. I told him that he knew more than my husband on what parts come with what, that's when a woman came around counter and said that she was the owner and that I didn't need to talk to her employee that way. I wasn't being rude or belligerent. I just didn't think it would have been that hard to ask if the customer knew it didn't come with bracket mounts, especially if he brought an older model in. This will be the last time my family and I will be back to that store and before today, I would have recommended that store to anyone. Now I'll tell people to stay away. It's nothing like it used to be.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hardy,
You did not speak to the owner for I am the owner, and I was at another store that day, you spoke to a co-worker, but Mrs. Hardy we have no idea what a customer's needs are until they inform us.
There are hundreds of units, and they change models every year, and the servicemen have to request what they need from us. We are a supply house, not a service company, and we are sorry that your husband did not realize he need additional products, but that was his call and not ours. Your husband was servicing his own unit.
We try and make all customers happy, and were sorry that you were disappointed, but do realize we have no idea what is wrong with a central unit until a serviceman request a particular part.

name: Gilbert Nicholson
text:
Johnny Rich is a great guy - one of the nicest fellows you'll run across in the HVAC community in Birmingham. But he's not reliable.

He had already been to my house on a couple of calls over the last couple of years, and did a great job. Back in October, I left him a voice mail on his cell phone to check my HVAC unit. No reply.

A few days later I texted him, and got a return text he would get back to me later. I never heard from him.

His voice mail says call his office for immediate help. I then left a message with a woman who answered the phone, who i assume was his secretary. She said she would pass the message on to him and he would call to set up an appointment. I never heard from him. In my book, three strikes and you're out.

I have no idea why he didn't want the business. But even if I had been a new customer, if he didn't want the business, or was too busy and didn't have time, you would think he would have the professional courtesy to call and say he was too busy. Or call back and say something.

I called Norrell, who was recommended by some friends. They responded immediately and fixed the problem at a reasonable rate. I won't be calling Absolute Air again.

name: Jackie Jones
text: Thank heavens Total Comfort Hearing & Air is under new ownership! In June 2017 we replaced our old units with two American Standard ac & heating units under the previous owner and the installers were awful.  We had small gas leaks on both units, insulation around the refrigerant lines was half ass done on the downstairs unit and not even replaced on the upstairs which was dried & cracking, etc.  When I called to have the has gas smell checked out the new owners were eager to get someone sent out immediately. The smell was intermittent so I wasn't sure if there was an issue. The first time Sonny came out & took care of the downstairs gas smell.  A few hours after he left the air purifier wasn't working.  Eddie came to our house and fixed and also noticed the "dryer" was installed backwards on the both units. He corrected both problems in addition to gas smell upstairs, & addressed the insulation on the refrigerant lines.  Eddie was wonderful! We so appreciate the time he has spent to address the install issues. My husband owns a construction company and we've dealt with several HVAC companies for our home & business....hands down we are so impressed with the service Total Comfort provides.  The ladies in the office are the first impression of the company and they are awesome! Total Comfort will continue to receive our business due to the great service & and friendly demeanor of their employees!

Harry was quick to come out, located the problems with our system and patiently explained what was wrong. He then discussed all of our options for repairing vs replacing. Unfortunately, we had to replace our 26 year old Trane system. Harry really helped us with this bad news and discussed financing options.  I hate that we have to go through this, but I am so glad that Harry was by our side. Top notch customer service with highly skilled, clean, courteous, can-do technicians. Highly recommend!
