name: Cheryl Whitley
text: Sonny, the worker that came to help me on my AC today was a very polite, kind, and thoughtful person who took his time to explain everything that he did and why. There aren’t a lot of people who do that and I appreciate that! Thanks Sonny! Thanks Total Comfort for having a worker like Sonny!

name: Sonya Smith
text: Great experience from start to finish. I talked to Chelsea in the office and she sent Eddie out to service my Furnace the same day. Very friendly and knowledgeable company.

name: Robert Blackwell
text: Love the new owners and their Service Technicians! Eddie took care of everything we needed and got our AC running the same night. Vast improvements in service since the new owners took over.

name: Jason Lassiter
text:
Amending my original review: after an initial failure to properly schedule my appointment (see original review below) Total Comfort called the next business day to apologize and to make things right. They offered to send a technician right away and offered to waive the service call fee to make up for the inconvenience. I really appreciated this. Anyone who accepts responsibility for a mistake and makes a good faith effort to fix things gets a second chance with me. The technician, who was nice and professional, quickly found and fixed the issue (a simple clog). Before he left we got a call from the owner who explained that there would be no charge for the service. All in all Total Comfort really turned things around and they will get my future business.

Original Review: I made an appointment. They did not call and did not show. Can't recommend.

name: Rick Whited II
text: Everyone I got to work with was extremely polite, knowledgeable and very professional.

resp.text:
Thanks for the kind words.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

Thanks,

Keith

name: Alantha Russ
text: Nothing but good things to say about this company. Eddie came out today for the normal maintenance and did a great job as usual. We really appreciate the time Total Comfort puts in to making sure a job is done right.

name: Sam Henderson
text: Total Comfort came to our rescue!  This winter Charter/ Spectrum caused an electricity surge at my house starting and electrical fire, frying my HVAC system and frying the motor on a refrigerator and freezer. Total Comfort saved us before it got to cold by coming out and quoting us a fair cost and then doing the repairs quickly and with quality work. I know I will continue to use them!  Great people. Great Service. As for Charter, not so much.

name: Kaz McFly
text: I thought I needed to replace my AC but Harry with Total Comfort came out and spotted the problem and fixed it. He could have gotten me to buy a new unit but didn't. Instead he allowed me to take my time and not make a rush decision by fixing the problem. I highly recommend Total Comfort. Honest, nice and fast service

name: Frankie Roe
text: We had a great experience with Total Comfort Heating and Air. Our heat had stopped working suddenly.  When I called the office to make the appt., the lady I spoke with was helpful and courteous. Gary came out, was very nice, and within a few minutes, our heat was up and running again.  Would highly recommend these folks!!

name: Dennis Bryant
text: I bought a unit from this Company 10 years ago and it was an awful experience. To much to list. The unit went down this winter and i called to check on warranty information on the unit. Now this unit was purchased for my parents house and both are disabled. With that said my guard was up. As i placed the call i found that Total Comfort is under new management. Expecting the worst. Boy was i wrong. The new management and ownership at Total Comfort was a huge breathe of fresh air. The team at Total Comfort was honest and up front with me from the start. They offered about as much help to me as they could. The Technician named Soni that worked on my parents unit went above and beyond to take care of my parents. If you had a bad experience in the past then believe me its a new day with this Company. I personally want to say thank you to the team at Total Comfort for bending over backwards to give me any and every option they could. From an angry customer years ago to a customer that will only call the new team at Total for anything me or my family members need. Thank you Total for all your help.

name: Belinda Allen
text: Great company. Eddie came and installed a part I needed yesterday. Very polite and friendly.

name: J Davis
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Gary came out on a Saturday after 6 to fix our air out at Logan Martin. When I say that we were suffering, we were absolutely miserable in this house! It took him less than 10 minutes to fix the issue and cooled down a house full of women who came home after a Pell City mud run to an 87 degree house. Highly recommend Gary and Total Comfort heat and air!

name: Keely O'Really
text: Very honest and quick to diagnose our problems. We had 2 other companies come out and tell us 2 different things are wrong with our A/C unit only to find out by the Total Comfort tech that that was not the problem and even got our AC running for the time being until we could get it fix. Great service, came on time, and very polite and knowledgable. I recommend them to anyone who is in need of AC repair.

name: Margret Battle
text: Eddie came out last week to clean our package unit and thankfully caught some small issues before they caused major problems. He gave us a good price for repairs and helped us get financed quickly. Thanks TC

name: Diane Cook
text:
Absolutely wonderful experience. I had a total HVAC replacement plus blown in insulation. All technicians were on time, clean, courteous and completely professional. I will give them an A+ for a great job done.
Diane Cook

name: Kendall Jackson
text: Great experience.  Excellent new management and fair pricing!  Prompt service response.  Would recommend

name: Jason Smith
text: Just had our whole system replaced, and the guys at Total Comfort did a great job. Gary kept in touch with his whereabouts and time frame for the initial service call, and got the broken down system patched up long enough to get the new system in the following morning . The guys showed up with all the equipment before 8am and went straight to work after a friendly meet and greet with our dogs, who love company . They were both friendly and efficient, cleaned up after themselves, finished well before the estimated time frame, and did it all for a price that was on the low side of what we expected to pay . I would recommend these guys for any heating and cooling needs.

name: Carrie Cotney
text: Great experience! The service technician was polite and worked efficiently to solve our issue.  The new owners have done a great job!  I highly recommend Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Paige Cooper
text: I would recommend DJ for any services needed. He is friendly, courteous, and he cares about his customers.

name: Dustin Wilkerson
text: Excellent company to do business with. I highly recommend giving these guys a chance if you are in need of any HVAC work. It is my understanding they are under new ownership and are eager to ensure all of their customers are happy. They have definitely earned future business and recommendations from me.

name: Cal Markert
text: Saved me money with honest access net and only charged 50 for service call.  They knew what they were doing too.  Very pleased

name: Byron Williams
text: Thanks to Total Comfort for getting use up and running again. We appreciate the quick service and professional staff that came out to service our HVAC. After the tech explained everything I could readily see the problem and felt very comfortable going ahead with the repair. They where very professional.  We are very impressed.

name: Nathan Whitaker
text: We are attempting to sell our house and had an issue arise during inspection. Eddie had serviced the unit 2 weeks earlier and everything was in working order. We explained the issue about how we were held up with being able to close because of the inspection. Total Comfort went above and beyond and immediately came to ensure things were ok. Turns out that the inspector was wrong. The unit was working correctly. I video taped it to show the buyers the problem was not Total Comfort. It was their inspector. We have used Totsl Comfort for years and plan to have them install and new unit at our new home later. Eddie is the man!

name: debby cochran
text: Brett Shelton,  my service professional, was very nice and knowledgeable.I find they seem to care a lot about the customers.I would totally recommend them.

name: Holly Chapman
text: Thankful for the New Management for quickly repairing my unit. Professional, on time, and trust worthy. I would choose Total Comfort again and again and you should too!

name: Joe Randall
text: Cody was honest and efficient and took care of my problem. Will definitely call again.

name: Terry Payton
text: Glad they have new owners.  The new ones are terrific!   Took great care of us fast and very fair price.  Thanks again!

name: Stan Paschenko
text: Total Comfort has serviced my Hvac units for the past 3 years. I recommend this company because of their honesty and integrity. No pushy sales pitch.

name: Kelsey
text: I had an emergency call after coming home to an 86 degree house. There's technician was extremely friendly but no resolution was provided. Ther problem he said I had wasn't the problem at all. I missed an entire day of work to be told mid morning the next day noon one could come until afternoon. I could've gone to work in AC for the morning! Very disappointed in the level of service provided.

name: Valerie Chavez
text: Just  had total comfort heating and air come to my home and they just installed this new thermostat I could not be more pleased with their work friendly service and the price was just right.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Christy Thomas
text: New owners and management are fantastic!  Good quality customer service!  Very pleased with the work and it was completed in a timely manner.  Would definitely recommend!

name: Mike Gillespie
text: Very nice on the phone. Called to let us know the technician was on the way. Technician could not have been more helpful or professional with his explanations and wanting things to be done correctly! Would recommend them to anyone!!

name: Tracie Lewis
text: The tech was very courteous and professional. He and the company went above and beyond. Would highly recommend Total Comfort!

name: Jimmy Owen
text:
Setting the appointment was easy and the agent worked very well to set the appointment which was convenient for me.
The technician was great and explained everything very well.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Blakely Segroves
text: We were so impressed with the new owners!  Prompt and reliable service to repair my unit.  Would highly recommend them!

name: Kandy Kane
text:
Eddie was fantastic!!! Very professional and quick at fixing our problem.
We will only be using this company from now on! If you have any problems with your heating or air, definitely give Total Comfort a call!

name: Julian Kit
text: Called them out after our unit stopped working. The guy who came out only saw $$$, down played our system every chance he could. Said its to small for the house (our house is fairly small and it's always keep us plenty warm). Told us our system had rust which was causing the problem but got it working by taking a piece of wire and cleaning out the sensor. Took less than 2 min to get the system working but cost almost 100$ for next to no work. 18 point inspection is also a lie.

name: Linda Fomby
text: Tyler arrived in a timely manner and solved my problem. Very efficient.

name: Betty Gunter
text: Eddie was at our home yesterday and he’s such a sweetheart. We felt a little silly when he told us why our furnace wasn’t working but we’ll know what to look for next time. Thanks!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Joanne Walker
text: Great Service starting with the operator who took my request for a service call, to the technician who came. Thank you Sonny for being on time, courteous, polite and your very thorough checkup of our heat and air system.

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: James Howlett
text: Eddie came out and took care of our Furnace quickly and gave us a great price for the repair. Will be using this company in the future.

name: Vista Brooks
text: Awesome Company!!! New management that still believes in making sure that mistakes that were made before are fixed. Quick service and a great staff!!!

name: Lillian Wilson
text: They have always been on time and very polite people.I am so glad we used them for our heating and air :)

name: lori krauss
text: Can not say enough about this company and Gary Dailey.  We noticed our air was not working around 3 pm on a Saturday. We were at our lake house in Talladega. I called four other companies, that said they were 24/7. None would return a call. No one even answered. I called Total Comfort and spoke to Gary. We were almost near heat stroke at this point. He could sense the desperation in my voice. He said let me make a few calls, and if I'm able I'll be on my way. Ten minutes later he called back and said he was on his way. Drove from Gardendale to Talladega to look at our unit and see what could be done. He was a lifesaver. It was the capacitor. He had a new one on his truck, and fixed it within 30 minutes. What normally would have cost a lot, on a Saturday evening was a few hundred bucks or so. I would have given them 10 stars if I could have. WE WILL NEVER USE ANYONE BUT TOTAL COMFORT AGAIN!!! IM not a person that leaves reviews, but I have never seen such amazing customer service EVER.

name: Zach Batizy
text:
Was quick and efficient. Helped solve the problem really well

-Sheila Batizy

name: Jay Cardwell
text: Harry did an outstanding job and he was very professional

name: Mora Taylor
text: Sonny was very professional and explained the process very well. I would highly recommend Sonny and Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Terrance Darling
text:
Great job!! Knowledgeable technicians!!! Thanks Harry and Sam.

Mr. Darling

name: B K Gray
text: Worst experience I ever had. Do not, and I repeat do not use this company. Misleading techs, customer service is terrible. Been trying to get a refund, will not return phone calls. I have a service level agreement, and had to buy a new unit from them(which now I don't believe I needed), and they treat you like crap. Everything is about $$$ to them. I agree with Julian

name: Madison Garner
text: They are very unloyal and misleading to their employees! The owner has very bad anger issues and treats people with the upmost disrespect! I wouldn't dare recommend their services not only because of how he does his employees, but by his general characteristic traits. Also the fact that he only hires " attractive young women" ( for office work), is also very disturbing and discriminating. He also doesn't seem to concerned with his customers either. Unless your buying a new unit or signing a service agreement you mean nothing to him.

name: Bryan Blackmon
text: Right Now, Christmas Eve 2014 marks less than 6 months with my new system (old one was 20+ years old and died) from this company. The installation re-used some of the parts from the old system. I have had to call them back out now for the third time in less than 6 months to check on the system and while the people are very friendly, I am highly unsatisfied. A unit of this age (when properly installed) should have zero issues cooling a townhome of my size and should (in general) have no problems. It is now Christmas Eve 2014 and all creatures are stirring because the damned-new HVAC Heat Pump will not cool off my home. Thanks.

name: Lonnie Moore
text: Technician showed up on time, assessed the problem and quickly fixed it. You can’t ask for more than that.

name: Barbie Moore
text: Extremely friendly and fast service 🙂🙂🙂

name: Calvin D Tucker II
text: Service above excellent!

name: Jessica Ray
text: Very professional, excellent customer service.

name: Soleado C
text: Awesome!!!!

name: Joseph Jackson
text: Honest, Experienced, Trustworthy, Timely, and Fair.

name: Joycelyn Oden
text: I had a very good experience with this company! I will be using them again!

name: Terry Merritt
text:
AWESOME SERVICE and AWESOME PRICES!
(Honest, integrity, fair, compassionate etc...)
The absolute BEST in town!!!!!

Hands down this company is the best in town! They try their best to save money when possible rater than trying to “up-sale” when a quick fix is an option.  Their Tech, (Chris Carr) is awesome!  He was so very helpful, considerate and professional.   Our experience with using this company on 4/13/21 has made us “Joyful Jolly Clients Forever”. If you looking for an honest company who sincerely looks for ways to help customers save money then call Jolly ONLY, you won’t be disappointed trust me.
I’d give this company 15 stars if I could as they rank far above 5 stars in every category from the first call I made to the end of the service call.
I would not just rate them “good” on their evaluation, I would rate them “great” in every category. They are all excellent and very professional.   They have made us “new customers”  for life because of customer service, quality and affordability  and we plan to tell everyone we know on Facebook and social media as word of mouth and great experience is the best advertising.
Jolly has brought back the true old fashion “customer service”  we once expected years ago that got lost over the years.  If you want to experience the traditional customer service of years ago, call JOLLY!

Simply a great company for in every single category!

name: Danny Kirchar
text: This was by far the most pleasant and professional encounter I have ever had with a company before. The technician was super polite and extremely warm and gracious and thoroughly explained the services needed AND gave me an exact cost. It did take a little while to get together the money for him. But even then he remained very patient and extremely helpful and just so pleasant. I'll never use another HVAC service as long as Jolly is in business

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and support of our family!

name: Jennifer Noland
text: Beware! Technician came to my house to rewire a thermostat. Once there, he told me that we had blown the transformer and fuse on the main unit and the cost at that point would be $624 to replace those 2 things and rewire the thermostat. I told him I couldn't afford that and he said "well mam I can't help you with that. There's nothing else I can do for you then." I needed my ac running so I gathered up every cent I had and told him to go ahead with the repair. He then came in and told me that the thermostat wasn't telling the unit to kick on so we must have fried the new thermostat also. He left the base plate wired up and told me that it was wired correctly and I just needed to go get a new touchpad and it would work. He is a professional and I trusted his word so I paid him the $600 and he left without it working. It was late Saturday night so I ran and got the new one first thing Sunday morning. I put it on the wall and it would not work. I had to call another repairman to come out and fix it Sunday. There was nothing wrong with the 1st thermostat. The problem was that the Jolly technician wired it wrong. Now I question everything he did that night. I feel like I paid a lot of money for absolutely nothing. I have called twice and cannot get a call back. I should have refused to pay but I trusted this guys word. I will not make that mistake again. Please be careful when dealing with this company!!!!

resp.text:
Jennifer,
We are looking into the ticket now.  We are sorry to learn that your experience with Jolly was anything less than stellar!  Someone from our office will be contacting you shortly.

name: James Lee
text: Responded quickly and took care of job.

name: Lisbeth Weinheimer
text: Very professional service with quick responsiveness to our issue.  We were out of town and our dog sitter alerted us that our AC had stopped working.  Jolly Heat and Air was recommended by a friend that had used them in the past. By the time we got home the service man was already finishing up and had restored our cooling system. It was so nice to come back to a cool home! The technician, Travis was very knowledgeable and helped us understand what was wrong with our unit. We would highly recommend Jolly to anyone who has Hvac issues.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!  We are thrilled that you are pleased with our service.

name: Ronnie Causey
text: Technician was right on point and very helpful...

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review about your experience with Jolly!  We are so pleased that you are happy with your service.

name: Lisa Getts-Folsom
text: Very nice and knowledge staff. Honest and trustworthy.

name: Shelley Vold
text: This company ALWAYS has sent me professional and curteous technicians. Angel answered the phone and took my call. She is always so nice! Today Ethan came in a timely manner and within 20 min had resolved the issue and left. I have used Jolly for almost ten years and wouldn't dream of choosing anyone else.

name: Ray Ray
text: My appointment was from 1-4pm I called at 1:30pm and they actually had someone available to come. Russ came within 20 minutes introduced himself and in about 12 minutes has figured out what was wrong with my ac. It was pricey but it had to be done! He already had called and checked on the parts and was ready to go get them. He fixed the issues in a timely manner! Very polite and great customer service! Really great experience with jolly!

name: Rachel Taylor
text: We have found our new HVAC company! We will certainly call them in the future. All of the technicians are helpful and friendly. I highly recommend.

name: amanda bobo
text: Very quick to fix our problem today. We had bad wiring, bad breaker and bad thermostat. I have used jolly for years and would recommend them anytime. Always pleased and satisfied with their services. You guys are awesome.

name: Alan Davis
text: Service technician from Jolly was prompt arriving and worked late into the evening to complete a tune up and coil cleaning on my residential unit.  Surveyed all of the equipment right up to the air filter condition.  Provided a good over view of the system and items that would probably need repair in the future along with estimates so I could plan and budget for the work.  Overall great job and would recommend the company to anyone needing AC services.

name: clark sheehan
text: The team showed up early and was extremely courteous and professional.  They were a pleasure to have in our home and actually looked like they enjoyed what they did. I highly recommend this this company.

resp.text: We are so happy that you were pleased with the service you received from Jolly!  The technicians also gave you 5 ⭐️ ‘S for being an amazing customer.  We had to order some more T-shirt’s to get the correct size but we will mail you one as soon as they are ready.

name: Timbotide
text:
Jolly Heating and Air Conditioning just installed a new Trane Heat Pump for us.
This was my first experience with them and I was very impressed with the level of
Service we received. Everyone was very knowledgeable and willing to answer all of
Our questions in a professional manner. I highly recommend Jolly Heating and AC to
Anyone needing a new system installed or maintenance and repair work on your existing system.

resp.text: Wow!  Thank you so much for your kind words!  We are so happy to learn that you are satisfied with the service you received.  We will make sure that the installers who came to your home know how pleased you are with their service.

name: Chrysoula Brison-Holtzhauer
text: They sent me a guy who knew exactly how to fix my gas fireplace. He was extremely nice, talkative and very smart! He gave me a coupon which is always appreciated. Said his company was going to expand and they also provide premium services to customers who become members for regular annual maintenance & visits. I'm gonna check it out. Ask for Russ!

name: John Heathcoat
text: Technician is very impressionable.  He displayed his a/c talent enthusiastically.  A great asset to this company. I appreciate his professionalism.  Thank you

name: Ann Davis
text: Did an awesome job as usual! Would never use anyone else!

name: Hayden Reed
text: Excellent service and knowledgeable technicians. Russell was prompt, courteous, and professional. Would highly recommend.

name: vickie may
text: Gas log maintenance service. Excellent job and very polite!!

name: Angie Pradat
text: Russ was very professional, knowledgeable and friendly. He explained everything to me in great detail and answered all my questions. Very pleased.

resp.text: Thank you so much for takin the time to share your experience!  Russ is a great service technician but he is also a wonderful person!  We are so glad you noticed it too!

name: Chris Boothe
text: Couldn't ask for a better technician! They send the same tech out to service my property every time. Wes preforms outstanding work with a wonderful attitude.

resp.text: Wes is a great guy!  We are thrilled to know that this translates to our customers!  We will be sure to share this review with Wes

name: Quinton Shockley
text: I called Jolly to fix my ductless mini split unit that had developed a refrigerant leak. Russ was sent out the following day and quickly found the leaking connections in the lines and recharged the system to the proper level. Russ was very friendly and knowledgeable, and he did not leave until the unit was running properly and all fittings were checked. I will continue to use Jolly and recommend them to others based on the prompt professional service and reasonable price.

resp.text: Thank you, Quinton!  We are so happy that you were pleased with the service and the price from Russ!  We will let him know the kind words you shared about him. We appreciate your business.

name: Mary Byars
text: If you are reading this review, trying to decide between this company and another, LOOK NO FURTHER! I am blown away by the level of customer service I received today. Even though it was bad news (have to replace the unit), I am extremely satisfied and more than thankful for the quick, friendly and affordable service! Russ was my technician, and he is outstanding! Very knowledgeable & very respectful guy! Would recommend this company to everyone I know!! Thanks Jolly! 👍🏼

name: Jonathan Skelton
text: Tyler came by when our AC wasn't blowing cold.  Not only did he recharge the refrigerant he also did a thorough inspection and found a couple of other small things that would have caused issues in the future.  Very kind and professional.  Great work!

name: Andrea Hirst
text: Excellent service and very prompt. I needed a new unit when my heat went out, it was 22 degrees!! They installed the unit the very next day. All round fantastic service from the office personnel and the technicians. Highly recommended this local company.

name: Tim Ott
text:
These guys are the best, very polite and informative and professional. Your Home Town Heating and Air. They are all I will use form now on.

Tim

name: Stephanie Smith
text: The tech they sent out was great. He fixed my unit for a very reasonable price! I highly recommend these guys.

name: Annie Cartwright
text: Enjoying cool indoor!  Appreciate timely service and friendly repairman.  Thanks!

name: Caroline Sandel
text: This company was really good to work with!  The technicians and office staff were all friendly and professional.  We had a couple of issues after installation that required a follow-up visit, and Travis quickly made sure all issues were addressed and answered all of my questions.  These guys did a great job and I would definitely use Jolly again.

resp.text: Thank you, Caroline!  We are so glad that your experience was a positive one.  Leaving a review for the company is very important to us so please know we greatly appreciate you taking the time to let others know how your service went with Jolly.  Thank you for your business!

name: James Bates
text: Returned home from a trip overseas to an AC that had quit while we were away. Russ was sent to my house and he arrived within the estimated timeframe and quickly diagnosed the issue with the exterior unit. He safely and efficiently removed and installed the needed piece of equipment and made sure to wait and ensure that the system was indeed working properly with the new equipment installed before he left. I will be requesting Russ from Jolly from now on and am very pleased with my experience with the technician and the company!

resp.text: Thank you, James!  Russ is a great team member and a highly requested technician.  I will make sure that Russ hears the nice things you left in your review about him.

name: Cathleen Hines
text: Fantastic customer service!  Our technician spent time making sure our problem was resolved.  And he went above and beyond to give us additional tips and tricks to maximize our system. Thanks Jolly’s!!

name: LOUISE MANOS
text:
I cannot say enough nice things about Jolly Heating and Air. The woman who answered the phone and got my info was courteous and kind. The technician (George) who called me back was prompt and professional. George arrived when he said he would and quickly diagnosed and fixed my A/C. He then checked everything and made recommendations for the future.
Within a short period of time my house was cool and comfortable.
I will definitely be calling Jolly and George again whenever I need any of the services they provide. You should too!

resp.text: Thank you, Louise!  We appreciate you taking the time to let us and others know how your service from our company was.  It is always our goal for 100% customer satisfaction and we are pleased to know that your experience was pleasant from start to finish.

name: Steve Rachel
text: I was impressed with the reminders that were sent ahead of the call. When Russ got here, he found the problem and repaired it quickly. We also purchased a WiFi thermostat and he helped us program it. All this was done while following social distancing guidelines.

name: Jennifer Green
text:
Jolly Heating & Air Conditioning repaired  my gas logs.  They were very prompt, professional, and knowledgeable.  The technician, Tyler, did a great job.  I will definitely use them for future heating and cooling repairs.
Jennifer Green

name: Kristine Fitts
text: Excellent service, customer care and merchandise. This is a very professional commpany and I like the detail of receiving an email prior to service calls with a photo of the technician(s) coming. Reasonable prices and efficient workers. I highly recommend this company.

name: Robert Wilson
text: Excellent customer service, always polite and on time. They pay attention to details like wearing shoe covers when in the house. They are very willing to answer questions.

name: owdavis
text: Good quality and fast service! Ben was very professional and courteous!

name: Michael Hayes
text: Technicians arrived on time and did an excellent job.  I make it a point to have them out twice a year for maintenance.  Jolly has been providing exceptional service to my home's heating and cooling since 2009.

name: Sidra Simpson
text: Tyler is awesome with a great smile!!! He has such a pleasant attitude knows his work and makes you feel very comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you, Sidra!  We appreciate you taking the time to review your experience with Jolly!  We will make sure to let Tyler know the kind words you said about him.

name: Linda Cain
text:
Service provided by Russ Carr was prompt and through.  The issue with our unit was resolved without a return visit.
Will use Jolly H&A for any future service.

name: Gabrielle Cruz-Uribe
text: I am very impressed with the caring customer service shown by everyone I have had contact with. The office personnel called me after I reported a problem, but chose not to deal with it immediately, to check on whether I was still having problems, and if I needed or wanted them to send someone. The service technicians are always very polite and professional, and good at finding the problem and fixing it.

name: Kati Williams
text: Jolly Heating and Air Conditioning is amazing!  They were quick, prepared, and excellent with communication.  I would highly recommend you calling Jolly for all your needs!

resp.text: Thank you, Kati!  We think you are pretty amazing too!

name: Anthony Martin
text: I always have appreciate the professional experience, everytime I call for Russ! He is the bomb! My guy!🤝

name: Joycelyn Croom
text: Everything was prompt and professional, from the initial phone call to request service, to completion, my experience was great. Tim was pleasant to talk to and patiently answered all of my questions. The technician (Russ) that came out to do the job, also gave A1 service and advice. I will definitely use this company again!

resp.text: Hi Joycelyn!  Thank you so much for your feedback.  Your opinion of our service is very important to us and we are glad to know you had such a great experience!

name: Joe Nelson
text: Great experience! Service people are quality individuals. I have used them twice and they have always provided top notch service with great attitudes. I had to call after hours and they showed up promptly and did excellent work! Will continue to use in the future.

resp.text: Thank you, Joe!  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review to let others know that you had a great experience with Jolly.

name: DAVID HUGHES
text:
Jolly has always handled my calls promptly and with competent, professional technicians. The last three or four times Russ was my technician. He has quickly diagnosed the problem, discussed solutions, offered valuable advice, then implemented corrections.
I appreciate prompt, courteous and professional service when I have a problem that affects my family. Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review, David!  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to let us know Russ is taking such good care you and your family!  I will be sure to let Russ know that you left such a nice review about him.

name: Kimberly Baines
text:
After a two year absolute nightmare with our home warranty company (American Home Shield) who sent Meyer’s Comfort Specialist to our home to install a new air conditioner, we now have a new unit installed by Jolly!!!  Our new unit cools fabulous!!!  There were so many things that were not up to code with our previously installed unit including a coil that was installed backwards!!!!!!!  Taylor and Travis came to our house, were there all day and answered every question that we had no matter how small they may have been.  They both worked tirelessly!!! They said our attic was the hottest of the year so far and even with that worked to make sure everything was brought to code and installed properly!!!! I can not thanks Jolly enough for their patience and understanding with these very frustrated home owners!!!!!  WE APPRECIATE YOU ALL!!!!!!! A BIG thanks to Angel too for all of the times that I called to ask a question!!!!! I WOULD RECOMMEND THEM
OVER AND OVER AGAIN!!!

resp.text: Kimberly, we are so happy to learn to you enjoyed your experience with Jolly!  We try to make the process as easy as possible so we are glad to know that it is working for our customers.

name: Clay Jones
text: Fast, friendly service in the middle of a hot August weekend.

resp.text: keeping the August heat outside since 1993

name: Muriel Frye
text: Excellent and very fast service. Called in the morning and they sent a team to our home within a few hours. One hour later and our AC was working again. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving a review!  We are glad that you are happy and cool in your home.  Thank you for your business!

name: Paul Fancher
text: The office people are always friendly and polite. The service guys are always professional, courteous, and on time.  Great  company.

name: Jerri McCreless
text: Came within reasonable time on a SUNDAY!!!  Guy was helpful and professional. Had the problem fixed in 35 minutes (bad contact points).  Was worth every penny,!  Highly recommend JOLLY!

resp.text: Thank you, Jerri!  We are so pleased that we gave you suck great service.

name: Brian Jun
text:
One of my air conditioning units at my business was not blowing out cold air, so I had called a technician out to take a look at it.
After some inspection, he told me that the best option for me would be to replace the unit. Keep in mind this unit was installed only 3 years ago.
The rates were ranging between $7000-$8500 which weren't bad.
The REAL problem was the fact that I was literally LIED to, telling me that we needed a brand new unit.

resp.text: Hi Brian.  Thank you for giving us feedback about your experience with Jolly.  We did some research on the call and would like to speak with you further about how you felt about the service call.  We tried reaching out to you.  Check your inbox when you get a chance.

name: Drew Henson
text:
I will not let anyone else touch my exhaust hood or HVAC units. They are very responsive, very professional and get it done right. And they stand behind their work.
Thank you!

name: john denton
text: James did a great job! Very professional, kind, and honest. Highly recommend Jolly!!

name: willie townsend
text: The technician that came out on Monday was prompt and professional, he was very knowledgeable and was able to give me a honest estimate on fixing my old unit or replacing it with a new cost efficient one. The technicians who came out to replace and install my new unit was very efficient polite and they kept me informed of the work as it was progressing. The work was done in a timely manner they showed me how to maintain the air filters and how to work the thermostat.  Thanks to Jolly we are jolly in the comfort of our home, thank you.

name: Eric St. Clair
text: This is the third time I've used Jolly for my HVAC needs and each time they've been great. I've also had the same technician,Ben M, two of the three times and I've found him knowledgeable, courteous, prompt and overall, a great asset in getting my HVAC up and running.

text: Great people, Greatprices, and helped out a lot will definitely be using them for all my heating and cooling needs

name: Traci Jaffray
text: Jolly was fantastic to work with. Great service when setting the appointment up, fast and efficient. Our technician Russell was awesome - so friendly and really takes pride in his work. Fixed the problem with our air conditioning, stayed with us for a few minutes to ensure everything was working properly, and was great company... shared some of his favorite fishing spots with us since we're new to the area. We'll definitely use Jolly in the future.

name: naomi lunsford
text: Technician was prompt kind courteous extremely knowledgeable and gave us a very good price I wouldn't go to anywhere else in town

name: Andy Maddox
text: I called Jolly early in the morning to set up appointment between 1:00 and 4:00 PM. It was around 3:30 and I was starting to wonder if they were going to miss the scheduled appointment and not call me. They called me around 3:45 to let me know that technicians were running a little late but they would definitely be coming today (I appreciated the courtesy call). Technician called me around 4:10 to let me know they were on their way. They also emailed me with a short bio on the technician and his photo. When I got home to meet them, they had already fixed the unit. Friendly, professional and didn't feel like I was getting scammed. Great experience. I will use them again in the future. Much better experience than another major HVAC contractor in Tuscaloosa. Jolly is my new "go-to" HVAC contractor in Tuscaloosa.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving a review for our company.  Your attention to detail and well written review will help others to know what to expect when calling for service.  We truly appreciate you!

name: Christopher Lyons
text: James did a great job hooking up our mini-splits. Hard worker and made sure the job was completed correctly.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Lyons for mentioning the great work that James provided for you!  We truly appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback.

name: Sheryl McKinley
text: Russ was very conscientious and arrived in a timely manner. He answered all of our questions and was very thorough! Highly recommend Jolly Heating and Air!

resp.text: Thank you, Sheryl!  We appreciate your feedback.  We will be sure to share your comments with Russ.

name: Jackson Willis
text:
Very prompt service, however the promptness comes at a high price. Came first thing in the morning and fixed what they thought was the problem. $80 diagnostic and then $120 to clean the flame sensor. $120 is really high for that, but the service had already been performed before I was informed of it, so had to pay.

Left, had an issue 2 hours later. Came back quickly, which was nice, but found that the circuit board was bad on the furnace. Had to replace. Very high price that I was able to negotiate down a little bit, but now my heat works.

Great service, but at an astronomical price.

name: Krista Slagel
text: Very friendly and professional staff! Russ was our tech and we give him 5 stars as well! Definitely recommending Jolly to others!

resp.text: Krista, thank you for taking the time to let us know how we did!  We will be sure to let Russ know that he received 5 stars for a job well done!

name: Annette Gilliland
text: Service came at a GREAT price. Too expensive for my budget but I had to get my air repaired asap because i was having surgery the following  day.

resp.text: Hi Annette!  I know that air conditioning repairs can be an unexpected expense so we so try and give competitive prices for our services.   There is almost always a coupon being offered to help with some of the cost to repair.  This coupon is on our website and Facebook page for use at any time.  Coupon expired? Just give us a call and we will be more than happy to work you.  Providing same day service and well- trained technicians can incur a cost that we do our best to keep as low as possible.  I get that not everyone can make the choice to use Jolly.  Our service does not work for everyone’s budget. If you decide it works for you, we’d love to have you.

name: guy rex
text: Russ was on time, very polite and took the time to explain what was wrong with my unit and the options to get it repaired. I would definitely use them again

text: Ben came out to check out a couple issues that were written up on my home inspection before the sale of our house.  He was very polite and made sure that I was getting the best service possible. Explained what needed to repaired very clearly.  Overall pleased with Jolly.

text: Jolly is a great company.  Technician did great work and gave great money-saving advise. Will definitely use Jolly again n the future!

name: Julie Lewis
text: I am so thankful for Jolly Heating & Air.  I called them about a problem with my A/C unit and they were at my house within the hour. I have 2 children who would have been frozen in our cold winter if it wasn't for them coming out so quickly. Thank you for your speedy service! Will definitely use again and will recommend to anyone who needs work done quickly.

name: Anne Davis
text: The company sent a person the very same day I called with a problem. The young man was very knowledgeable and very delightful to talk with. So happy we bought our gas logs from Jolly Heating, we have enjoyed them so much!

name: Martin Agnew
text:
While in the process of selling my home, a technician came out to inspect my fully functioning unit. After leaving, my unit was no longer pushing air through the house and there was a pungent burning smell. I contacted Jolly, but no assistance was offered without a $150 service call charge plus the cost of parts, which he said would run around $2,500. He then quickly solicited me to instead consider buying a new unit from them instead of paying the $2,500 to repair the unit.

The next day I had a technician from another HVAC company come to look at the unit and they said the report Jolly had written was nearly entirely false, and the reason the unit was no longer working was because the technician from Jolly did not reconnect the blower wheel.

Not only might this affect the sale of my home, but my wife and 18 month old daughter were forced to stay somewhere else because they had no heat in the middle of December.

resp.text:
Mr. Agnew,
Anytime you have an issue with a price, you can always call the office during normal business hours and talk to our Office Manager.  She is always here willing to help.  I cannot confirm what the other company you called out found.  I trust my technicians and their expertise more than any other company.  An inspection took place and the proper pictures are on file from that inspection.  All paperwork supports the repairs noted in the inspection.

name: Julie Lewis

name: Joann Wiggins
text: Got my air and heat working great. To hot for no air.  Very nice gentleman. Thanks

name: Nancy Owen
text: All I can say is Autumn Air was professional, trustworthy, economical and exceeded all my expectations. There is nothing more aggravating than to have your air conditioning unit quit. Although it is mid-October we needed our air conditioning fixed ASAP. Our unit was 17 years old and I knew we needed to replace it if not immediately, within the very near future. I emailed a few companies Saturday night asking for estimates and to please contact me Monday morning. Only Autumn Air and one other company returned my call today. Autumn Air was very pleasant and offered to have someone come out to price the unit immediately. Since I knew I did not want to start throwing money away repairing such an old unit I asked for a quote for a new unit (with and without the furnace). Skip came out and priced the unit with three options and it was clear if I wanted more options he would give them to me. He did not acted putout or frustrated with my request. He did not pressure me to make a decision nor did he push me to buy the most expensive product. Without me asking, he let me know the specials that were being offered. I asked how soon they could install the unit and he said either this afternoon or in the morning. I called my husband and sent him the estimates. My husband was impressed and even showed his fellow employees who were also impressed with the prices. After weighing the pros and cons we decided to replace the entire unit (with furnace). I called Skip back about 2:30 saying we did want to go ahead and replace the unit, he said he would call me right back, that it would be either this afternoon or in the morning. I was floored when he called me back shortly afterwards and asked if it was okay with me if they could install it today. Skip and two other gentlemen came and installed the unit working hard until close to 9:00 pm. We were all extremely grateful to the diligence of these men. In addition, Autumn Air included a 2-year service plan where they will come out to service/clean the unit twice a year. They have earned my trust. I am very thankful to Autumn Air.

name: John Hosmer
text:
For a long while there have been atmosphere issues in our basement where the previous home owners had never taken care of sealing up the rooms and keeping temps and humidity in check. We had addressed those issues and we had tried using good filters at the returns to prevent as much of any dust, mold spores, etc. from recirculating and spreading, but it ended up being a losing battle for both comfort and our family's health.  Finally, about a month ago I disconnected one of the flexpipes at the end of the trunk run to see just how bad it was and found almost 100% coverage of dust, mold, and nastiness throughout the system. It was in every bit of the trunk, and every flexpipe throughout the house (See pictures). Even a few of the vent registers had started harboring mold growth which was a really bad sign as well.

So, I did what any good panicking homeowner would do at that point. Went to Google, pulled up nearby HVAC companies with good reviews that could do duct replacement, and called for appointments for onsite inspections. Out of the four highly reviewed and reputable companies (minus individual contractors) in the Pelham area that actually showed up for their appointment, Autumn Air's rep Baker was the only one who showed up on time, actually visually inspected inside the ductwork even after I showed him the initial pictures I took, and then spent a solid amount of time explaining to me options for replacing the entire ductwork system so we could see about what would be right for our budget. In the end, the price that Autumn Air was able to provide for an upgrade to a new round smooth metal interior and outside insulated wrapped system, including new boots and registers, throughout the entire house, plus a new central AprilAire Space Guard filtration and iWave-R GPS ionization system upgrade (per my request) beat out the one other company who actually sent me a quote by almost half. Let me say that again differently...TWO of the four companies NEVER sent back a quote. This told me that two of the highly reputable companies in the Pelham area that have a high amount of favorable reviews simply did not want a job. Pitiful for them.

Fast forward to the install a week later...Led by two guys named Javy and Charles, they took care of making sure everything was treated with care when taking out the old ductwork so as to minimize spreading of dirt and mold as much as could be. Then, they proceeded to assemble and install all of the new system on site for custom fitting plus making sure all seams were taped properly and coated with mastic so that the chances of air leaks past the coils is forever kept at a minimum. They arrived early in the morning, and worked until the job was finished that evening (on the day of Harvey storms coming through too!).  Any questions I had concerning anything with the job was answered and explained with no hesitation on their part.  They went beyond expectations with accommodations and I just can't be any happier.

I can't say it enough in this entire description here how great Autumn Air is for an HVAC company. They want someone's business in the best way because they give the work the best service they can at reasonable prices, and offer great financing options too if needed. They understand how to go the extra mile to make sure the customer is being taken care of in the end as well. I can say I have also had the pleasure of meeting Jeff, the owner, later when he came back to look at a minor issue that crept up post install, and he is just as awesome about discussing more than the "here's what we'll do". He takes the time to explain the why and how's (if you are interested to know and ask) and will work with you as a customer to do everything he can within reason to make sure you are satisfied with him and his company. Because of all of these things described about everyone at that company and how we were treated, we now not only have clean, sanitized fresh air, but the confidence to know it will stay that way due to the complete service and professionalism we got from Autumn Air.

Description of work:
Heat Pump and Air Handler Replacement - increased from 4ton unit to 5ton unit - duct work modifications to accommodate increase. Original construction of our home, 12 years ago, was  rushed and the a/c and duct work was thrown together quickly and in a sloppy manner. Our duct work was constricting air flow and in need of modifications. Our power bill was astronomical. So we called Autumn Air.

name: Max Levi
text:
Autumn Air (Charles in particular), have been absolutely incredible!  My existing furnace kept cutting off in the mornings, but then it ran fine for most of the day.  It was a difficult thing to track down, and they never quit troubleshooting to get to the root of the issue so they could fix it the right way.

This took several trips, they tried several things, one at a time, to narrow it down.  Instead of changing a bunch of things or applying "band-aids", they worked hard to pinpoint the true issue.  It ended up being a piece of metal (limit) that was popping and shutting it off prematurely (before the heat limit actually occurred).  So a tiny faulty limit had to be found, and they found it.

It took a lot of patience and tedious work at times.  They just had the attitude of "I'll find the root cause no matter what it takes, and I won't stop until I find and fix it."  I truly believe others would have given up or chalked it up to an issue with my new thermostat.

I really appreciate the time and effort that was put into troubleshooting, not giving up, and finding the real issue, and fixing it the right way!

name: Deidre Stone
text: We built our house just 3 Summers ago. During that 3 years it seems like either 1 unit or the other was in a struggle and the builder's installer was at my house at least every 6 months. It just never did heat or cool correctly and ran what seemed like constantly. You can imagine my frustration in a new home. This spring we called Autumn Air. They came right out and checked everything. They even went into the attic and found an issue with a clogged drain. (which the other guys never did) The air has been so cold all Summer that we can't set it under 74 without getting a chill and my power bill is HALF of what it has been in the past! Here we are 4 months later and my technician, Baker, gives me a courtesy call to just see how things are going since the service. I can't say enough good about these guys! Affordable, professional, and quick! I won t call or recommend  anyone but Autumn Air going forward!!Thanks for taking the stress out of my Summer!

I couldn't be more happier with my experience with Autumn Air Heating & Cooling, I'll never use another heating & cooling company ever again. name: Woody Armstrong
text: I have been with a different local HVAC company for the past 4 years. I had been content with them and their service until I had a repair. I had a capacitor go out and I was charged over $300 to replace it. I didn't think much about it until I shared my story with a few people who know what they are talking about. Turns out it was a steep price! I lost TRUST and confidence with them for work. I heard Autumn advertising on WDJC and thought I would check them out. Their monthly maintenance program is very reasonably priced and I even quizzed them on how much a capacitor replacement would run...much more reasonable! So I made the switch and scheduled my first maintenance visit...next day I might add and not in 6 weeks like the other. I was once again shocked at how bad my other service companies quality of work was for maintenance as Charlie showed me all of the stuff that wasn't being done! So, I am very happy I made the switch and hopeful that I have a company I can trust!

name: Lee McCarty
text: Our air conditioner decided to break down late Friday night, so I found myself in the position of trying to find someone to come out on Saturday to fix it. After calling numerous other companies that were in my area, each time just being told they had no available service time except later in the week, (none of them even asked exactly what the unit was doing, or what was wrong). I found Autumn Air online, and even though they weren't in my area, I figured I had nothing to lose trying them. My call was answered professionally, and he took my info and told me that they were pretty full for the day, but that they would try to fit me in. He asked me for details on what was wrong. After about 10 minutes, he called me back saying that they had a cancellation and a tech could be. at the house in about an hour. An hour later the tech was here and within 30 minutes we had cool air!!! I want to thank Autumn Air for taking the time to talk to me and for fitting me into their busy schedule on such a hot Saturday. The price was VERY reasonable, especially considering that it was a Saturday in the busy Summer season. I would recommend this company to everyone I know!

resp.text: Lee thanks so much for the recommendation.  Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

text: I gotta say these guys are awesome. They’ve now installed two new AC units in two different houses for us. Each time, they were genuinely empathetic to fact that nobody’s having a good day when their AC breaks, and were more than fair in pricing. Yesterday, they came out to do annual service on that last AC unit, and their tech spent almost a whole extra hour with me - for FREE - to walk me through a water heater installation I was trying to do myself and was kinda in over my head on. The whole reason I opted to do that job myself was that one plumber quoted me $2k, and OnTime Service wanted $179 just to come out and offer a quote (no thanks). Needless to say, I trust Ethridge and would def recommend them.

name: David Sherrill
text:
I can't say enough good things about Ethridge. We have had to replace both of our units in our house over the last two years. During our most recent one, we had a small issue and they quickly sent someone out to fix it. When we had a problem with the older of the two units, they, again, quickly got someone on site to both fix the issue, and do a thorough investigation of both our units.

You know the quality of any company starts at the top and the is true here as well. Mr. Ethridge is such a great guy. He employs people like Daniel who is one of the nicest and most conscientious service people I've ever met.

So, if you need a new unit, service on your current unit, or just looking for someone to perform maintenance, I HIGHLY recommend Ethridge! They may not always be the absolute cheapest, but you do get what you pay for in this type of work. They are worth every penny!

text: Excellent experience!

It was really nice to experience this level of customer service,  I will not hesitate to call Ethridge in the future.

name: Brandon Mitchell
text: In a span of about 3 weeks fighting the AC and the home warranty company, my wife and I were really getting disheartened about just moving into our first home. We dealt with two separate AC companies with no avail before contacting Ethridge Heating and Air. Once I did, they made the process incredibly simple and stress free. They seemed to really care and were punctual with the install. Now, thanks to them, we are able to enjoy our new home and worry about the fun stuff about making a house a home. In my opinion there's only one HVAC company worth dealing with, and they now have a customer for life, Ethridge Heating and Air. They'll fix it FAST!

text: Very professional and knowledgeable technicians. Installation of our new upstairs system went smoothly and was finished relatively quickly. I probably could have gotten cheaper service elsewhere, but I'd be hard pressed to say that I could have gotten better.

name: Richard Wederman
text: I called at 7:30 a.m. to have my to have my AC checked out, it started blowing warm the night before. Two technicians were at my house by 11:00 a.m. and had my unit diagnosed and fixed in 40 minutes. They replaced a faulty capacitor for a very fair price. Everyone was very professional and friendly. I highly recommend Ethridge.

name: sqlb3rn segfavlt
text:
Nice folks, absurd prices, had to call them back out on 2 separate occasions because the tech didn't finish the job. Got charged more money of course. Check around before you commit to thousands of dollars, I'll be using a different company from now on.

Edit: was quoted $710 to install a new fan blade and $1300 for a new fan motor. I bought a OEM fan blade online for $38 and installed it myself in 10 minutes. The motor is perfectly fine. Enjoying cold AC again after a 3 day wait for shipping. I don't know how they get off charging that much, I think they just want people to finance repairs.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback. We would love to resolve any issue but we can’t tell who you are based on the anonymity of your Google username. We take pride in our work, our pricing, and the handling of any customer concern. Nearly every customer that does a large job with us, shops around, does their homework, and in the end, hires us to do the work. The process goes smoothly, and everyone is happy. We apologize for whatever has caused you to feel differently and would like to resolve any concern fairly. So if you wouldn’t mind, please make yourself known to us as we had no idea there was an issue until now. You can do that here, or feel free to call our office to begin resolving whatever it is that concerns you. We’d love to help, but we don’t know who you are. If this is a true concern and this is not a case of you reviewing the wrong company, all you need to do is call to resolve. We are more than fair and will work with you to resolve your concern. Thanks!

They offered a great price, warranty, and were respectful to my family- including our nosey pup that followed them around. We highly recommend Ethridge Heating and Air.

Wonderful customer service, friendly & knowledgeable technicians! Owner is very engaged in his company, and it shows! I called one evening and he answered the phone himself, personally taking care to assess my needs & book my appointment for the next day. Our job ended up being a big one! Super quick response and 2 crew installation of our new units (2 outside units, furnace and condenser in basement, plus one condenser in attic). Definitely recommend and we will continue using them for our HVAC needs!!

Unfortunately, they used RedBrick Financial Group for financing when we purchased our units, and RedBrick was awful to deal with! Shady practices, extremely rude “customer service”, no transparency in billing, difficult to make payments, and will put a lien on your home without notice or authorization. Stay away from RedBrick!
****Very glad to see (on Ethridge H & A website) that they NOW use Wells Fargo for financing! We have used WF for multiple banking accounts & they are very transparent and payments are easy to make in multiple ways.*****

name: John Byrd
text: The team was fast to respond and very responsibly priced

name: dcasey
text:
I called and spoke with Becky (could have been Rebecca) in the office. She was very patient with me as I explained what was going on with my unit. I later learned that she obviously had taken really good notes based on the phone conversation I had a day later with the technician (wish I'd gotten his name).
The unit in question is at my house that is for sale. The buyer's "inspector" (loosely used here) said the unit had a serious problem. I had the unit maintained twice per year (it is important to note that this twice yearly maintenance was not done by Ethridge) for each of the 10 years since the unit was installed so I didn't really believe that much could be wrong with it but was required to have it checked out.
After thoroughly inspecting and testing the unit, the Ethridige technician called to let me know the unit was fine, in fact he found no problems at all.
He could have easily gone with what the "inspector" said and the repairs or replacement could have made them a lot of money. But, this company chooses ethics and honesty and in doing so earned a customer.
I recommend this company and I plan to contact them for a maintenance contract for my home because I know these folks will not take advantage of me.

text: Tech was on time and did the work needed on the unit.  Didn't realize how low the freon was.  He refilled the freon and now it's making the unit cycle better and the house is more comfortable without working itself to death.

name: Ali D
text: Terrible, horrible, awful would not recommend to anyone.  Only one of the three technicians they sent out were competent.  Our AC was out one month June 14 - July 15 and they repeatedly misdiagnosed what was wrong with our ac and expected us to pay for their mistakes.  We are pretty sure they broke the ac coils (we didn't have problems before they messed with it) and they re-wired our thermostat incorrectly.  I had to call constantly to get updates and no one seemed to have a clue.  Customer service is poor to say the least.  Once we FINALLY got the ac fixed they wanted to dispute the invoice.  DO NOT HIRE MIDSOUTH TO DO ANY AC WORK!

name: Cross Fire
text: Great company, honest and so easy to deal with. I choose my contractors based on their personality and how they act.  Mid South was honest from the start and they were able to get out the next day to replace my coil.  I had several questions for the company who originally installed my 4 year old central AC unit (3D) and they dodged me like the plague which says so much about their business. Mid South was completely honest, very personable, friendly  and I could go on.  If you need hvac help call Mid South and don't waste your time with anyone else.

name: Brian Gullage
text:
$616............for 2 twenty dollar capacitors and a 15 minute service call.  So my previous 5 star review has changed.

I have been a very loyal customer of Midsouth, and I have recommended them to numerous people. I have always given them excellent reviews.

I know small businesses have high expenses and need to make a profit, but overcharging a loyal customer that sends you referrals has consequences.

resp.text:
Hello Mr Gullage,
I hope you are doing well. I just wanted to make a quick response to your negative feedback. We actually charged you 485.00 for (2) pounds of Freon and (2) capacitors. This is a very competitive price in our area for the service that was performed on your HVAC system.

We always give upfront pricing before any work is completed. You had the option to approve or decline the work  before any work was performed on your system. You approved the work order and then we made the needed repairs. Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any more questions or concerns. You can contact our office @ (205)730-1270. As always, we appreciate your business!!!

We do our very best to stay as competitive as possible to help our customers.
